general.quote: t is easier to be a lover than a husband for the simple reason that it is more difficult to be witty every day than to say pretty things from time to time.
general.author: honore de balzac

general.quote: It is easy to talk on religion, but difficult to practice it.
general.author: ramakrishna

general.quote: Thinking is easy, acting is difficult, and to put one’s thoughts into action is the most difficult thing in the world.
general.author: johann wolfgang von goethe

general.quote: If things are natural, they’re easy. If they’re unnatural they’re difficult. I have never met a man who found it difficult to marry, but I have never found a man who found it easy to divorce either.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: It is easy to sit up and take notice, what is difficult is getting up and taking action.
general.author: al batt

general.quote: Life isn’t meant to be easy. It’s hard to take being on the top — or on the bottom. I guess I’m something of a fatalist. You have to have a sense of history, I think, to survive some of these things. Life is one crisis after another.
general.author: richard m. nixon

general.quote: It is easy to hate and it is difficult to love. This is how the whole scheme of things works. All good things are difficult to achieve; and bad things are very easy to get.
general.author: confucius

general.quote: To find a fault is easy; to do better may be difficult.
general.author: plutarch

general.quote: Everyone is handed adversity in life. No one’s journey is easy. It’s how they handle it that makes people unique.
general.author: kevin conroy

general.quote: A wise man thinks what is easy is difficult.
general.author: john churton collins

general.quote: Painting is easy when you don’t know how, but very difficult when you do.
general.author: edgar degas

general.quote: Faith makes all things possible… love makes all things easy.
general.author: dwight l. moody

general.quote: There is a light at the end of the tunnel… hopefully its not a freight train!
general.author: mariah carey

general.quote: For those people hoping for a light at the end of the tunnel, this report reveals the tunnel is still under construction.
general.author: anthony chan

general.quote: No matter what you’re going through, there’s a light at the end of the tunnel and it may seem hard to get to it but you can do it and just keep working towards it and you’ll find the positive side of things.
general.author: demi lovato

general.quote: There is absolutely, 100 percent, a light at the end of the tunnel for anyone who stutters.
general.author: emily blunt

general.quote: Every time I’m shooting a movie I want to kill myself. Because I don’t see the light in the end of the tunnel.
general.author: emir kusturica

general.quote: As a matter of fact, there is still a lot of light at the end of the tunnel. We just have to find a way to get to it.
general.author: tyrone willingham

general.quote: Light at the end of the tunnel? We don’t even have a tunnel; we don’t even know where the tunnel is.
general.author: lyndon b. johnson

general.quote: Sometimes that light at the end of the tunnel is a train.
general.author: charles barkley
the light at the end of the tunnel is well worth the journey it took to get there. ~amber kanady

general.quote: There is light at the end of the tunnel, but how long is the tunnel?
general.author: david briggs

general.quote: The light at the end of the tunnel is not an illusion. The tunnel is.
general.author: unknow

general.quote: Struggling is hard because you never know what’s at the end of the tunnel.
general.author: don rickles

general.quote: Some days are better than others … It’s been a long journey, but we’re starting to see the light at the end of the tunnel now.
general.author: brian robertson

general.quote: If you do not see light at the end of the tunnel, consider it an opportunity to create an opening yourself, wherever you want.
general.author: ashok kallarakkal

general.quote: The thing about a hero, is even when it doesn’t look like there’s a light at the end of the tunnel, he’s going to keep digging, he’s going to keep trying to do right and make up for what’s gone before, just because that’s who he is.
general.author: joss whedon

general.quote: If you see the light at the end of the tunnel, you’re looking through binoculars the wrong way.
general.author: josh stern,

general.quote: It’s true. The storms won’t last forever. The nasty weather will never last. There is always that light at the end of the tunnel.
general.author: diana rose morcilla

general.quote: Retiring for good wasn’t difficult. I knew at the time it was right. I was no longer capable of achieving the standards I’d set myself and there was no light at the end of the tunnel.
general.author: ian botham
politicians are people who, when they see light at the end of the tunnel, go out and buy some more tunnels. ~john quinton

general.quote: We can see the light at the end of the tunnel. We just need to keep battling. We’re a team that has stuck together through the good times and the bad times. Our reward is near.
general.author: aaron rowand
poetry is the tunnel at the end of the light. ~j. patrick lewis

general.quote: Also the wonderful thing about film, you can see light at the end of the tunnel. You did realize that it is going to come to an end at some stage.
general.author: john hurt

general.quote: It’s hard no matter where you are in the world, it’s always a bit of a battle, but there is light at the end of the tunnel.
general.author: andrew jack

general.quote: There is a light at the end of the tunnel. It can’t go lower. It can only go up.
general.author: jay patel

general.quote: At the end of every light, is a tunnel of darkness.
general.author: anthony liccione

general.quote: There is light at the end of the tunnel for India, but it’s that of an oncoming train which will run them over.
general.author: navjot singh sidhu

general.quote: Age does not bring you wisdom, age brings you wrinkles.
general.author: estelle getty

general.quote: The wisdom of age: don’t stop walking.
general.author: mason cooley

general.quote: The mind that is wise mourns less for what age takes away; than what it leaves behind.
general.author: william wordsworth

general.quote: Be wise with speed; a fool at forty is a fool indeed.
general.author: edward young

general.quote: Not by age but by capacity is wisdom acquired.
general.author: plautus

general.quote: At sixteen I was stupid, confused and indecisive. At twenty-five I was wise, self-confident, prepossessing and assertive. At forty-five I am stupid, confused, insecure and indecisive. Who would have supposed that maturity is only a short break in adolescence?
general.author: jules feiffer

general.quote: As one grows older, one becomes wiser and more foolish.
general.author: francois de la rochefoucauld

general.quote: They’re not gray hairs. They’re wisdom highlights.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: I associate wisdom and grace with age.
general.author: christy turlington

general.quote: I actually think with age comes some level of wisdom.
general.author: nina totenberg

general.quote: Much of the wisdom of one age, is the folly of the next.
general.author: charles simmons

general.quote: Morality comes with the sad wisdom of age, when the sense of curiosity has withered.
general.author: graham greene

general.quote: The older I grow the more I distrust the familiar doctrine that age brings wisdom.
general.author: h.l. mencken

general.quote: To know how to grow old is the master work of wisdom, and one of the most difficult chapters in the great art of living.
general.author: henri frederic amiel

general.quote: No wise man ever wished to be younger.
general.author: jonathan swift

general.quote: The latter part of a wise person’s life is occupied with curing the follies, prejudices and false opinions they contracted earlier.
general.author: jonathan swift

general.quote: Now that I am sixty, I see why the idea of elder wisdom has passed from currency.
general.author: john updike

general.quote: The old — like children — talk to themselves, for they have reached that hopeless wisdom of experience which knows that though one were to cry it in the streets to multitudes, or whisper it in the kiss to one’s beloved, the only ears that can ever hear one’s secrets are one’s own!
general.author: eugene o’neill

general.quote: I look forward to growing old and wise and audacious.
general.author: glenda jackson

general.quote: How earthy old people become — moldy as the grave! Their wisdom smacks of the earth. There is no foretaste of immortality in it. They remind me of earthworms and mole crickets.
general.author: henry david thoreau

general.quote: Gray hairs are signs of wisdom if you hold your tongue, speak and they are but hairs, as in the young.
general.author: philo

general.quote: He that is not handsome at 20, nor strong at 30, nor rich at 40, nor wise at 50, will never be handsome, strong, rich or wise.
general.author: george herbert

general.quote: I am this day forty-three years old: as years increase, may I grow more wise and gracious.
general.author: hannah ball

general.quote: The person of wisdom is the person of years.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: At 20 years of age the will reigns; at 30 the wit; at 40 the judgment.
general.author: benjamin franklin

general.quote: Not till the fire is dying in the grate, look we for any kinship with the stars. Oh, wisdom never comes when it is gold, And the great price we paid for it full worth: We have it only when we are half earth. Little avails that coinage to the old!
general.author: george meredith

general.quote: [A] youthful old age is the rich and mellow autumn of life… the mind is ripe in wisdom… the intellect is still active and vigorous… spiritual character has reached its full terrestrial maturity of virtue.
general.author: w.j. hunter

general.quote: In growing old, we become more foolish and more wise.
general.author: francois de la rochefoucauld

general.quote: Wisdom doesn’t necessarily come with age. Sometimes age just shows up all by itself.
general.author: tom wilson

general.quote: Age is a terrible avenger. The lessons of life give you so much to work with, but by the time you’ve got all this great wisdom, you don’t get to be young anymore.
general.author: elizabeth wurtzel

general.quote: With age comes a greater wisdom, an ease and comfort with oneself. Cherie Lunghi Wisdom, Age, Oneself The older I grow the more I distrust the familiar doctrine that age brings wisdom.
general.author: h. l. mencken

general.quote: The philosophies of one age have become the absurdities of the next, and the foolishness of yesterday has become the wisdom of tomorrow. William Osler Wisdom, Age, Tomorrow I feel increasingly like age is very irrelevant. Quite often, cynicism is confused with wisdom, and my scorn is confused with a knowing, which I don’t have.
general.author: laura marling

general.quote: The wisdom of the wise and the experience of the ages are perpetuated by quotations.
general.author: benjamin disraeli

general.quote: What the tech industry often forgets is that with age comes wisdom. Older workers are usually better at following direction, mentoring, and leading.
general.author: vivek wadhwa

general.quote: What we call wisdom is the result of all the wisdom of past ages. Our best institutions are like young trees growing upon the roots of the old trunks that have crumbled away.
general.author: henry ward beecher

general.quote: Those who improve with age embrace the power of personal growth and personal achievement and begin to replace youth with wisdom, innocence with understanding, and lack of purpose with self-actualization.
general.author: bo bennett

general.quote: Life, Work, Time Let no one be slow to seek wisdom when he is young nor weary in the search of it when he has grown old. For no age is too early or too late for the health of the soul.
general.author: epicurus

general.quote: Children also have artistic ability, and there is wisdom in there having it! The more helpless they are, the more instructive are the examples they furnish us; and they must be preserved free of corruption from an early age.
general.author: paul klee

general.quote: Once upon a time the world was sweeter than we knew. Everything was ours; how happy we were then, but then once upon a time never comes again.
general.author: johnny mercer

general.quote: Once upon a time only washington’s face was on our money, now washington’s hands are on it too.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Years ago, fairy tales all began with Once upon a time… now we know they all begin with, If I am elected.
general.author: carolyn warner

general.quote: Never forget that once upon a time, in an unguarded moment, you recognized yourself as a friend.
general.author: elizabeth gilbert

general.quote: Once upon a time is now.
general.author: emilie autumn

general.quote: Once upon a time there was what there was, and if nothing had happened there would be nothing to tell.
general.author: charles de lint

general.quote: Once upon a time, there was a clear set of choices that people made. Now there are so many choices of how to think, how to define ourselves.
general.author: tamar jacoby

general.quote: Once upon a time, soft toys were for babies. Now they’re taken for granted as a feature of adult life.
general.author: brian sutton-smith

general.quote: Once upon a time we were just plain people. But that was before we began having relationships with mechanical systems. Get involved with a machine and sooner or later you are reduced to a factor.
general.author: ellen goodman

general.quote: Once upon a time we did not focus on a president’s private life.
general.author: tom ford

general.quote: Once upon a time, we saw ourselves as gatekeepers … but you can’t do that now. You want to get people in the doors … you have to show your value. You can’t just sit back and say, ‘We have all the knowledge in the world, come here if you want.’ We have to do more than that.
general.author: don buckley

general.quote: Once upon a time there was a girl who was special. This is not her story. Unless you count the part where I killed her.
general.author: e.j.anderson

general.quote: There was no ‘before’ the beginning of our universe, because once upon a time there was no time.
general.author: john d. barrow

general.quote: One hundred years ago, if someone said, ‘damn,’ people would take notice. Now, you can say almost anything. Secrets are the same way. Once upon a time when a secret was revealed, people paid an enormous amount of attention to it.
general.author: paul levinson

general.quote: Once upon a time, there were only three or four dominant women. Now, there are 10 to 15 who can vie for a Grand Slam.
general.author: stephane simean

general.quote: Our story is a ‘once upon a time‘, but it’s not a ‘happy ever after’.
general.author: rupert sanders

general.quote: Once upon a time, forests were repositories of magic for the human race.
general.author: john burnside

general.quote: Once upon a time there was a politician who made an especially conspicuous ass of himself and didn’t say the newspapers misquoted him.
general.author: robert elliott gonzales

general.quote: Once upon a time, business solved its problems by raising prices. Now, they solve their problems by cutting costs and getting better productivity. It reflects that productivity but doesn’t force pricing, doesn’t constrict profit margins. It’s what an economy’s supposed to do.
general.author: neal soss

general.quote: Once upon a time, sound was new technology.
general.author: peter jackson

general.quote: We don’t need lists of rights and wrongs, tables of do’s and don’ts: we need books, time, and silence. Thou shalt not is soon forgotten, but Once upon a time lasts forever.
general.author: philip pullman

general.quote: I’m very accepting with my age. It’s like notches on your belt: experience, wisdom, and a different kind of beauty. There comes a day when you’ve become comfortable in your skin.
general.author: zoe saldana

general.quote: Wisdom, Age, Power Children also have artistic ability, and there is wisdom in there having it! The more helpless they are, the more instructive are the examples they furnish us; and they must be preserved free of corruption from an early age.
general.author: paul klee

general.quote: We all grow up. Hopefully, we get wiser. Age brings wisdom, and fatherhood changes one’s life completely.
general.author: frank abagnale

general.quote: Wisdom, Age, Direction The wisdom of the wise and the experience of the ages is preserved into perpetuity by a nation’s proverbs, fables, folk sayings and quotations.
general.author: william feather

general.quote: We were just slogging on from day to day and making the best of it. But with a light at the end of the tunnel… AMERICA!
general.author: frank mccourt

general.quote: If you can see the light at the end of the tunnel, you are looking the wrong way.
general.author: barry commoner

general.quote: Unhappiness in a child accumulates because he sees no end to the dark tunnel. The thirteen weeks of a term might just as well be thirteen years.
general.author: graham greene

general.quote: Some actors couldn’t figure out how to withstand the constant rejection. They couldn’t see the light at the end of the tunnel.
general.author: harrison ford

general.quote: If we only wanted to be happy it would be easy; but we want to be happier than other people, which is almost always difficult, since we think them happier than they are.
general.author: charles de montesquieu

general.quote: Education makes a people easy to lead, but difficult to drive; easy to govern, but impossible to enslave.
general.author: omar nelson bradley

general.quote: There is nothing so easy but that it becomes difficult when you do it reluctantly.
general.author: publius terentius afer

general.quote: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
general.author: lao tzu

general.quote: Muscles come and go; flab lasts.
general.author: bill vaughan

general.quote: Things go up and down. If you can survive the down, it will come back.
general.author: john denver

general.quote: You never know where your influences are going to come from, or where you’re going to find your inspiration.
general.author: page mcconnell

general.quote: Looking for the perfect day is not going to make us happy, because that day isn’t going to come.
general.author: ariel gore

general.quote: The more one analyses people, the more all reasons for analysis disappear. Sooner or later one comes to that dreadful universal thing called human nature.
general.author: oscar wilde

general.quote: Conscience is an exact recorder, that writes every man’s history; an inward witness, that will sooner or later speak the whole truth; an impartial judge, whose sentence will acquit or condemn.
general.author: john thornton

general.quote: But men never violate the laws of God without suffering the consequences, sooner or later.
general.author: lydia m. child

general.quote: Moments of kindness and reconciliation are worth having, even if the parting has to come sooner or later.
general.author: alice munro

general.quote: Sooner or later you must move down an unknown road that leads beyond the range of the imagination, and the only certainty is that the trip has to be made.
general.author: bruce catton

general.quote: Greet every morning with open arms and say thanks every night with a full heart. Each day is a precious gift to be savored and used, not left unopened and hoarded for a future that may never come.
general.author: regina brett

general.quote: The length of a man’s outspread arms is equal to his height.
general.author: leonardo da vinci

general.quote: Every man’s dream is to be able to sink into the arms of a woman without also falling into her hands.
general.author: jerry lewis

general.quote: Stand by your man. Give him two arms to cling to and something warm to come to.
general.author: tammy wynette

general.quote: Don’t stand back with your arms folded; step forward… There is hope and light to resist injustice and promote peace without violence.
general.author: adolfo perez esquivel

general.quote: A truly rich man is one whose children run into his arms when his hands are empty.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: A mother’s arms are made of tenderness and children sleep soundly in them.
general.author: victor hugo

general.quote: That’s what people do who love you. They put their arms around you and love you when you’re not so lovable.
general.author: deb caletti

general.quote: I’m of a fearsome mind to throw my arms around every living librarian who crosses my path, on behalf of the souls they never knew they saved.
general.author: barbara kingsolver

general.quote: Millions and millions of years would still not give me half enough time to describe that tiny instant of all eternity when you put your arms around me and I put my arms around you.
general.author: jacques prévert

general.quote: Gamble, cheat, lie, and steal. Let me explain: Gamble for your best shot in life – dare to take risks. Cheat those who would have you be less than you are. Lie in the arms of those you love. And finally, steal every moment of happiness.
general.author: caitlyn jenner

general.quote: Raise your eyes and count the small gang of your oppressors who are only strong through the blood they suck from you and through your arms which you lend them unwillingly.
general.author: georg buchner

general.quote: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
general.author: barbara bush

general.quote: Father God, we just ask You to open Your wide, wide arms and look down upon us, Lord, and lead us, and let us know what we should do to stop this, this terrible, terrible holocaust.
general.author: norma mccorvey

general.quote: The best way to hold a man is in your arms.
general.author: mae west

general.quote: A hug delights and warms and charms, that must be why God gave us arms.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: There are some people who want to throw their arms round you simply because it is Christmas; there are other people who want to strangle you simply because it is Christmas.
general.author: robert staughton lynd

general.quote: If I must die, I will encounter darkness as a bride, and hug it in mine arms.
general.author: william shakespeare

general.quote: Men greet each other with a sock on the arm, women with a hug, and the hug wears better in the long run.
general.author: edward hoagland

general.quote: Open your arms to life! Let it strut into your heart in all its messy glory!
general.author: deborah wiles

general.quote: Free men have arms; slaves do not.
general.author: william blackstone

general.quote: A hug is two hearts wrapped in arms.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Wisdom is the abstract of the past, but beauty is the promise of the future.
general.author: oliver wendell holmes

general.quote: The beautiful seems right by force of beauty, and the feeble wrong because of weakness.
general.author: elizabeth barrett browning

general.quote: There are as many kinds of beauty as there are habitual ways of seeking happiness.
general.author: charles baudelaire

general.quote: A woman who cannot be ugly is not beautiful.
general.author: karl kraus

general.quote: All kinds of beauty don’t inspire love; there is a kind that pleases only the sight, but does not captivate the affections.
general.author: miguel de cervantes

general.quote: There is no excellent beauty that hath not some strangeness in the proportion.
general.author: francis bacon

general.quote: As we grow old, the beauty steals inward.
general.author: ralph waldo emerson

general.quote: Beauty – in projection and perceiving – is 99.9% attitude.
general.author: grey livingston

general.quote: In life, as in art, the beautiful moves in curves.
general.author: edward g. bulwer-lytton

general.quote: I think that there is something truly beautiful in everybody you meet.
general.author: katie lowes

general.quote: Beauty is a form of genius, is higher, indeed, than genius, as it needs no explanation. It is of the great facts in the world like sunlight or springtime or the reflection in dark water of that silver shell we call the moon.
general.author: oscar wilde

general.quote: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
general.author: kahlil gibran

general.quote: Beauty is desired in order that it may be befouled, not for its own sake, but for the joy brought by the certainty of profaning it.
general.author: georges bataille

general.quote: Beauty is in the heart of the beholder.
general.author: al bernstein

general.quote: An art aims, above all, at producing something beautiful which affects not our feelings but the organ of pure contemplation, our imagination.
general.author: eduard hanslick

general.quote: Nobody is bored when he is trying to make something that is beautiful, or to discover something that is true.
general.author: william ralph inge

general.quote: It is generally a feminine eye that first detects the moral deficiencies hidden under the "dear deceit" of beauty.
general.author: george eliot

general.quote: What humbugs we are, who pretend to live for Beauty, and never see the Dawn!
general.author: logan pearsall smith

general.quote: Beauty: the power by which a woman charms a lover and terrifies a husband.
general.author: ambrose bierce

general.quote: Heat cannot be separated from fire, or beauty from the eternal.
general.author: dante, alighieri

general.quote: The ideal has many names, and beauty is but one of them.
general.author: w. somerset maugham

general.quote: A goal is not always meant to be reached, it often serves simply as something to aim at.
general.author: bruce lee

general.quote: Aim for the highest.
general.author: andrew carnegie

general.quote: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
general.author: lao tzu

general.quote: I think you should aim for the stars – and hopefully avoid ending up in the clouds!
general.author: roxanne mckee

general.quote: Aim at heaven and you will get earth thrown in. Aim at earth and you get neither.
general.author: c. s. lewis

general.quote: You need to aim beyond what you are capable of. You must develop a complete disregard for where your abilities end. Try to do things that you’re incapable of… If you think you’re incapable of running a company, make that your aim… Make your vision of where you want to be a reality. Nothing is impossible.
general.author: paul arden

general.quote: The aim of education is the knowledge not of facts but of values.
general.author: william ralph inge

general.quote: Aim at the sun, and you may not reach it; but your arrow will fly far higher than if aimed at an object on a level with yourself.
general.author: joel hawes

general.quote: The aim of the wise is not to secure pleasure, but to avoid pain.
general.author: aristotle

general.quote: Hire people who are better than you are, then leave them to get on with it. Look for people who will aim for the remarkable, who will not settle for the routine.
general.author: david ogilvy

general.quote: I never thought of myself as unlucky. When you aim high, it’s tough to get there unless something really fortunate happens.
general.author: henry cavill

general.quote: An aim in life is the only fortune worth finding.
general.author: robert louis stevenson

general.quote: You are capable of more than you know. Choose a goal that seems right for you and strive to be the best, however hard the path. Aim high. Behave honorably. Prepare to be alone at times, and to endure failure. Persist! The world needs all you can give.
general.author: e. o. wilson

general.quote: Aim higher. Stay focused.
general.author: brandon adams

general.quote: If the highest aim of a captain were to preserve his ship, he would keep it in port forever.
general.author: thomas aquinas

general.quote: The surest way to hit a woman’s heart is to take aim kneeling.
general.author: douglas william jerrold

general.quote: The aim of a college education is to teach you to know a good man when you see one.
general.author: william james

general.quote: Money is a strange business. People who haven’t got it aim it strongly. People who have are full of troubles.
general.author: ayrton senna

general.quote: The ultimate aim of the ego is not to see something, but to be something.
general.author: muhammad iqbal

general.quote: The leader must aim high, see big, judge widely, thus setting himself apart form the ordinary people who debate in narrow confines.
general.author: charles de gaulle

general.quote: Not failure, but low aim, is a crime.
general.author: james russell lowell

general.quote: Aim high, and you won’t shoot your foot off.
general.author: phyllis diller

general.quote: Life, Money, People Aim high, and you won’t shoot your foot off.
general.author: phyllis diller

general.quote: Aim for the sky and you’ll reach the ceiling. Aim for the ceiling and you’ll stay on the floor.
general.author: bill shankly

general.quote: We aim above the mark to hit the mark.
general.author: ralph waldo emerson

general.quote: Pursue one great decisive aim with force and determination.
general.author: carl von clausewitz

general.quote: Make big plans; aim high in hope and work, remembering that a noble, logical diagram once recorded will not die, but long after we are gone be a living thing, asserting itself with ever-growing insistence.
general.author: daniel burnham

general.quote: The great aim of education is not knowledge but action.
general.author: herbert spencer

general.quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
general.author: w. clement stone

general.quote: Only aim to do your duty, and mankind will give you credit where you fail.
general.author: thomas jefferson

general.quote: Times and conditions change so rapidly that we must keep our aim constantly focused on the future.
general.author: walt disney

general.quote: Keep a cool head and maintain a low profile. Never take the lead – but aim to do something big.
general.author: deng xiaoping

general.quote: Aim at perfection in everything, though in most things it is unattainable. However, they who aim at it, and persevere, will come much nearer to it than those whose laziness and despondency make them give it up as unattainable.
general.author: philip stanhope

general.quote: The aim of life is to live, and to live means to be aware, joyously, drunkenly, serenely, divinely aware.
general.author: henry miller

general.quote: If you aim at nothing, you’ll hit it every time.
general.author: zig ziglar

general.quote: Don’t aim at success–the more you aim at it and make it a target, the more you are going to miss it. For success, like happiness, cannot be pursued; it must ensue … as the unintended side-effect of one’s personal dedication to a course greater than oneself.
general.author: viktor frankl

general.quote: Never stop fighting until you arrive at your destined place – that is, the unique you. Have an aim in life, continuously acquire knowledge, work hard, and have perseverance to realise the great life.
general.author: a. p. j. abdul kalam

general.quote: Aim for success, not perfection. Never give up your right to be wrong, because then you will lose the ability to learn new things and move forward with your life.
general.author: dr. david m. burns

general.quote: Don’t aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.
general.author: david frost

general.quote: There are two things to aim at in life: first, to get what you want, and after that to enjoy it. Only the wisest of mankind achieve the second.
general.author: logan pearsall smith

general.quote: For a man to achieve all that is demanded of him he must regard himself as greater than he is.
general.author: johann wolfgang von goethe

general.quote: The way to get things done is not to mind who gets the credit for doing them.
general.author: benjamin jowett

general.quote: Failures, repeated failures, are finger posts on the mad? to achievement. One fails? forward toward success.
general.author: charles f. kettering

general.quote: There is no limit to what can be accomplished if it doesn’t matter who gets the credit.
general.author: ralph waldo emerson

general.quote: Someone has defined genius as intensity of purpose: the ability to do, the patience to wait. Put these together and you have achievement.
general.author: leo j. muir

general.quote: The only worthwhile achievements of man are those which are socially useful.
general.author: alfred adler

general.quote: The great accomplishments of man have resulted from the transmission of ideas, into enthusiasm, into actions.
general.author: thomas j. vilord

general.quote: A dream is just a dream. A goal is a dream with a plan and a deadline.
general.author: harvey mackay

general.quote: Having once decided to achieve a certain task, achieve it at all costs of tedium and distaste. The gain in self confidence of having accomplished a tiresome labor is immense.
general.author: thomas a. bennett

general.quote: Every worthwhile accomplishment, big or little, has its stages of drudgery and triumph: a beginning, a struggle, and a victory.
general.author: mahatma gandhi

general.quote: A man may fulfill the object of his existence by asking a question he cannot answer, and attempting a task he cannot achieve.
general.author: oliver wendell holmes

general.quote: Step by step. I can’t think of any other way of accomplishing anything.
general.author: michael jordan

general.quote: Man is always more than he can know of himself; consequently, his accomplishments, time and again, will come as a surprise to him.
general.author: golo mann

general.quote: The roots of true achievement lie in the will to become the best that you can become.
general.author: harold taylor

general.quote: Let us, then, be up and doing, with a heart for any fate; still achieving, still pursuing, learn to labor and to wait.
general.author: henry wadsworth longfellow

general.quote: The greatest things are accomplished by individual people, not by committees or companies.
general.author: alfred a. montapert

general.quote: Great things are not accomplished by those who yield to trends and fads and popular opinion.
general.author: charles kuralt

general.quote: Somebody is always doing what somebody else said couldn’t be done.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Our chief want in life is somebody who will make us do what we can.
general.author: ralph waldo emerson

general.quote: Our achievements speak for themselves. What we have to keep track of are our failures, discouragements and doubts. We tend to forget the past difficulties, the many false starts, and the painful groping.
general.author: eric hoffer

general.quote: The world is divided into people who do things and people who get the credit.
general.author: dwight whitney morrow

general.quote: It is time for us all to stand and cheer for the doer, the achiever — the one who recognizes the challenges and does something about it.
general.author: vince lombardi

general.quote: In the end, the size of a man’s accomplishments can best be measured by the size of their heart.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Life affords no higher pleasure than that of surmounting difficulties, passing from one step of success to another, forming new wishes and seeing them gratified.
general.author: samuel johnson

general.quote: All successful people, men and women, are big dreamers. They imagine what their future could be, ideal in every respect, and then they work every day toward their distant vision, that goal or purpose.
general.author: brian tracy

general.quote: You can do anything you wish to do, have anything you wish to have, be anything you wish to be.
general.author: robert collier

general.quote: Every time you acquire a new interest, even more, a new accomplishment, you increase your power of life.
general.author: william lyon phelps

general.quote: That which is achieved the most, still has the whole of its future yet to be achieved.
general.author: lao-tzu

general.quote: The body achieves what the mind believes.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Death comes to all, but great achievements build a monument which shall endure until the sun grows cold.
general.author: george fabricius

general.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
general.author: ralph waldo emerson

general.quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential… these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
general.author: eddie robinson

general.quote: What you declare, you will achieve. When you think you can’t revisit a previous triumph.
general.author: jack canfield

general.quote: Do not be desirous of having things done quickly. Do not look at small advantages. Desire to have things done quickly prevents their being done thoroughly. Looking at small advantages prevents great affairs from being accomplished.
general.author: confucius

general.quote: Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day; begin it well and serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense.
general.author: ralph waldo emerson

general.quote: We will either find a way, or make one.
general.author: hannibal

general.quote: The achievements which society rewards are won at the cost of diminution of personality.
general.author: carl jung

general.quote: For what is the best choice, for each individual is the highest it is possible for him to achieve.
general.author: aristotle

general.quote: The only way around is through.
general.author: robert frost

general.quote: High achievement always takes place in the framework of high expectation.
general.author: jack kinder

general.quote: It is easy to hate and it is difficult to love. This is how the whole scheme of things works. All good things are difficult to achieve; and bad things are very easy to get.
general.author: morarji desai

general.quote: There are no shortcuts to life’s greatest achievements.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: It’s no use saying, "We are doing our best." You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.
general.author: winston churchill

general.quote: Accomplishment is easiest when we work the hardest, and it is hardest when we work the easiest.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Not the maker of plans and promises, but rather the one who offers faithful service in small matters. This is the person who is most likely to achieve what is good and lasting.
general.author: johann wolfgang von goethe

general.quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
general.author: otto rank

general.quote: Cherish your human connections: your relationships with friends and family.
general.author: barbara bush

general.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
general.author: john fitzgerald kennedy

general.quote: It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor.
general.author: marcus annaeus seneca

general.quote: What you really value is what you miss, not what you have.
general.author: jorge luis borges

general.quote: A man should always consider… how much more unhappy he might be than he is.
general.author: joseph addison quotes

general.quote: Prosperity depends more on wanting what you have than having what you want.
general.author: geoffrey f. abert

general.quote: Let us learn to appreciate there will be times when the trees will be bare, and look forward to the time when we may pick the fruit.
general.author: peter sellers

general.quote: When I’m not thanked at all, I’m thanked enough, I’ve done my duty, and I’ve done no more.
general.author: henry fielding

general.quote: A mother’s arms are more comforting than anyone else’s.
general.author: princess diana quotes

general.quote: It is with certain good qualities as with the senses; those who are entirely deprived of them can neither appreciate nor comprehend them.
general.author: francois duc de la rochefoucauld

general.quote: Once we discover how to appreciate the timeless values in our daily experiences, we can enjoy the best things in life.
general.author: harry hepner

general.quote: It is a matter of the simplest demonstration, that no man can be really appreciated but by his equal or superior.
general.author: john ruskin

general.quote: Welcome everything that comes to you, but do not long for anything else.
general.author: andre gide

general.quote: If you look at life one way, there is always cause for alarm.
general.author: elizabeth bowen

general.quote: No music is so pleasant to my ears as that word father.
general.author: lydia m. child

general.quote: What sunshine is to flowers, smiles are to humanity. These are but trifles, to be sure; but, scattered along life’s pathway, the good they do is inconceivable.
general.author: joseph addison

general.quote: Appreciation is a wonderful thing; it makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well.
general.author: francois-marie arouet de voltaire quotes

general.quote: Being tall is an advantage, especially in business. People will always remember you. And if you’re in a crowd, you’ll always have some clean air to breathe.
general.author: julia child

general.quote: I actually remember feeling delight, at two o’clock in the morning, when the baby woke for his feed, because I so longed to have another look at him.
general.author: margaret drabble

general.quote: He is a man of sense who does not grieve for what he has not, but rejoices in what he has.
general.author: epictetus

general.quote: To appreciate the noble is a gain which can never be torn from us.
general.author: johann wolfgang von goethe quotes

general.quote: Appreciate life instead of resisting it.
general.author: judy tatelbaum

general.quote: It is up to us to give ourselves recognition. If we wait for it to come from others, we feel resentful when it doesn’t, and when it does, we may well reject it.
general.author: bernard berkowitz

general.quote: Appreciate me now, and avoid the rush.
general.author: ashleigh brilliant

general.quote: Who I am is the best I can be.
general.author: leontyne price

general.quote: It matters very little whether a man is discontented in the name of pessimism or progress, if his discontent does in fact paralyze his power of appreciating what he has got.
general.author: gilbert k. chesterton

general.quote: One appreciates that daily life is really good when one wakes from a horrible dream, or when one takes the first outing after a sickness. Why not realize it now?
general.author: william lyon phelps

general.quote: A word of appreciation often can accomplish what nothing else could accomplish.
general.author: b.c. forbes

general.quote: The happiest is he who suffers the least pain; the most miserable, he who enjoys the least pleasure.
general.author: jean jacques rousseau

general.quote: Appreciation is the purest vibration that exists on the planet today.
general.author: abraham hicks

general.quote: If we get everything that we want, we will soon want nothing that we get.
general.author: vernon luchies

general.quote: Courtesies of a small and trivial character are the ones which strike deepest in the grateful and appreciating heart.
general.author: henry clay

general.quote: We are very much what others think of us. The reception our observations meet with gives us courage to proceed or damps our efforts.
general.author: william hazlitt

general.quote: Considering the fortune you might have lost, you’ll have to admit you’re rich already.
general.author: john rothchild

general.quote: By appreciation we make excellence in others our own property.
general.author: voltaire quotes

general.quote: Next to invention is the power of interpreting invention; next to beauty, the power of appreciating beauty.
general.author: sarah margaret fuller

general.quote: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy.
general.author: anne frank

general.quote: Take full account of the excellencies which you possess, and in gratitude remember how you would hanker after them, if you had them not.
general.author: marcus aurelius

general.quote: Better a little fire to warm us than a great one to burn us.
general.author: thomas fuller

general.quote: It is common, to esteem most what is most unknown.
general.author: tacitus

general.quote: Appreciation can make a day — even change a life. Your willingness to put it into words is all that is necessary.
general.author: margaret cousins

general.quote: Long tresses down to the floor can be beautiful if you have that, but learn to love what you have.
general.author: anita baker

general.quote: I invented my life by taking for granted that everything I did not like would have an opposite, which I would like.
general.author: coco chanel

general.quote: God gave you a gift of 86,400 seconds today. Have you used one to say "thank you"?
general.author: william a. ward

general.quote: Generally the man with a good wife, or the woman with a good husband, or the children with good parents discover too late the goodness they overlooked while it was in full bloom.
general.author: james douglas

general.quote: The deepest principle in human nature is the craving to be appreciated.
general.author: william james

general.quote: We must never undervalue any person. The workman loves not that his work should be despised in his presence. Now God is present everywhere, and every person is His work.
general.author: saint francis de sales

general.quote: Thankfulness is the beginning of gratitude. Gratitude is the completion of thankfulness. Thankfulness may consist merely of words. Gratitude is shown in acts.
general.author: henri frederic amiel

general.quote: I would rather be able to appreciate things I can not have than to have things I am not able to appreciate.
general.author: elbert hubbard

general.quote: The talent for being happy is appreciating and liking what you have, instead of what you don’t have.
general.author: woody allen

general.quote: If you would but exchange places with the other fellow, how much more you could appreciate your own position.
general.author: victor e. gardner

general.quote: The human mind can bear plenty of reality, but not too much of intermittent gloom.
general.author: margaret drabble

general.quote: That which we obtain too easily, we esteem too lightly.
general.author: thomas paine

general.quote: Few love what they may have.
general.author: ovid

general.quote: To be of value, expressions of appreciation must be continually renewed.
general.author: sberee parris nudd

general.quote: Focus on where you want to go, not where your currently are.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: In all human affairs there are efforts, and there are results, and the strength of effort is the measure of the results.
general.author: james allen

general.quote: Our deeds determine us, as much as we determine our deeds.
general.author: george eliot

general.quote: A strong determination to get the best out of life, a keen desire to enjoy what one has, and no regrets if one fails: this is the secret of the Chinese genius for contentment.
general.author: lin yutang

general.quote: If your determination is fixed, I do not counsel you to despair. Few things are impossible to diligence and skill. Great works are performed not by strength, but perseverance.
general.author: samuel johnson

general.quote: I found that I could find the energy… that I could find the determination to keep on going. I learned that your mind can amaze your body, if you just keep telling yourself, I can do it… I can do it… I can do it!
general.author: jon erikson

general.quote: If you can’t find the key to success, pick the lock.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Enclose your heart in times of need with the steel of your determination and your strength. In doing this, all things will be bearable.
general.author: lora leigh

general.quote: Determine that the thing can and shall be done, and then we shall find the way.
general.author: abraham lincoln

general.quote: Determination gives you the resolve to keep going in spite of the roadblocks that lay before you.
general.author: denis waitley

general.quote: You’ve got to get up every morning with determination if you’re going to go to bed with satisfaction.
general.author: geroge lorimer

general.quote: To succeed in life one must have determination and must be prepared to suffer during the process. If one isn’t prepared to suffer during adversities, I don’t really see how he can be successful.
general.author: gary player

general.quote: Nothing great will ever be achieved without great men, and men are great only if they are determined to be so.
general.author: charles de gaulle

general.quote: Determination is the mental "I will" that gets results.
general.author: wesley a. stanger

general.quote: Give me a lever long enough, and a prop strong enough, I can single-handedly move the world.
general.author: archimedes

general.quote: The man who can drive himself further once the effort gets painful is the man who will win.
general.author: roger bannister

general.quote: There is one quality more important than know-how…. This is know-how by which we determine not only how to accomplish our purposes, but what our purposes are to be.
general.author: norbert weiner

general.quote: Determination that just won’t quit — that’s what it takes.
general.author: aj foyt

general.quote: Real leaders are ordinary people with extraordinary determination.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: When you locate good in yourself, approve of it with determination. When you locate evil in yourself, despise it as something detestable.
general.author: confucius

general.quote: What this power is i cannot say; all i know is that it exists and it becomes available only when a man is in that state of mind in which he knows exactly what he wants and is fully determined not to quit until he finds it.
general.author: alexander graham bell

general.quote: If you must begin, then go all the way, because if you begin and quit, the unfinished business you have left behind begins to haunt you all the time.
general.author: chogyam trungpa

general.quote: The surest way to fail is not to determine to succeed.
general.author: richard brinsley sheridan

general.quote: Determination is the fuel that propels one to higher virtues.
general.author: aaidh ibn abdullah al-qarni

general.quote: Be determined to handle any challenge in a way that will make you grow.
general.author: les brown

general.quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
general.author: vince lombardi

general.quote: Determine what specific goal you want to achieve. Then dedicate yourself to its attainment with unswerving singleness of purpose, the trenchant zeal of a crusader.
general.author: paul j. meyer

general.quote: Construct your Determination with Sustained Effort, Controlled Attention, and Concentrated Energy. opportunities never come to those who wait… they are captured by those who dare to attack.
general.author: paul j. meyer

general.quote: Those who want to succeed will find a way, those who don’t will find an excuse!
general.author: leo aguila

general.quote: You can do what you have to do, and sometimes you can do it even better than you think you can.
general.author: jimmy carter

general.quote: Only a man who knows what it is like to be defeated can reach down to the bottom of his soul and come up with the extra ounce of power it takes to win when the match is even.
general.author: muhammad ali

general.quote: In truth, people can generally make time for what they choose to do; it is not really the time but the will that is lacking.
general.author: sir john lubbock

general.quote: I’m a determined person. And if I’ve got an objective, I’ll make hours of sacrifice — whatever efforts are needed.
general.author: gerald r. ford

general.quote: An invincible determination can accomplish almost anything and in this lies the great distinction between great men and little men.
general.author: thomas fuller

general.quote: He who chooses the beginning of a road chooses the place it leads to. It is the means that determine the end.
general.author: harry emerson fosdick

general.quote: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
general.author: les brown

general.quote: Determination is the thing on which you can depend. It plods along without a swing, but gets there in the end.
general.author: edgar guest

general.quote: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline, and effort.
general.author: jesse owens

general.quote: So we built the wall and the whole wall was joined together to half its height; for the people had a mind to work.
general.author: bible

general.quote: The longer I live, the more I am certain that the great difference between the great and the insignificant, is energy — The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person’s determination.
general.author: tommy lasorda

general.quote: A determined heart takes no counsel.
general.author: quiros

general.quote: Human beings, by changing the inner attitudes of their minds, can change the outer aspects of their lives.
general.author: william james

general.quote: Resolve will melt no rocks. But it can scale them.
general.author: george eliot

general.quote: A man can do anything he wants to do in this world, at least if he wants to do it badly enough.
general.author: edward wyllis scripps

general.quote: Nothing is so common as unsuccessful men with talent. They lack only determination.
general.author: charles swindle

general.quote: Never let the fear of striking out get in your way.
general.author: babe ruth

general.quote: You too, can determine what you want. You can decide on your major objectives, targets, aims, and destination.
general.author: w. clement stone

general.quote: It has never been my object to record my dreams, just the determination to realize them.
general.author: man ray

general.quote: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate that can circumvent or hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.
general.author: ella wheeler wilcox

general.quote: If at first you don’t succeed-try, try again. Don’t think of it as failure. Think of it as timed-release success.
general.author: robert orben

general.quote: Determination is the wake-up call to the human will.
general.author: anthony robbins

general.quote: I will go anywhere, provided it be forward.
general.author: david livingstone

general.quote: A failure establishes only this, that our determination to succeed was not strong enough.
general.author: christian nestell bovee

general.quote: Determine your future now by taking hold of every opportunity.
general.author: debbye turner

general.quote: Goals determine what you’re going to be.
general.author: julius erving

general.quote: Determination is power. If the prospect be dark, kindle up the fire of resolution that nothing but death can extinguish.
general.author: charles simmons

general.quote: To him who is determined it remains only to act.
general.author: italian

general.quote: Be resolved and the thing is done.
general.author: chinese

general.quote: If you are determined — just do it!
general.author: italian

general.quote: With a resolute heart, a mouse can lift an elephant. Spreading the news is also multiplying it.
general.author: tibetan

general.quote: Focus on where you want to go, not where your currently are.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: In all human affairs there are efforts, and there are results, and the strength of effort is the measure of the results.
general.author: james allen

general.quote: Our deeds determine us, as much as we determine our deeds.
general.author: george eliot

general.quote: A strong determination to get the best out of life, a keen desire to enjoy what one has, and no regrets if one fails: this is the secret of the Chinese genius for contentment.
general.author: lin yutang

general.quote: If your determination is fixed, I do not counsel you to despair. Few things are impossible to diligence and skill. Great works are performed not by strength, but perseverance.
general.author: samuel johnson

general.quote: I found that I could find the energy… that I could find the determination to keep on going. I learned that your mind can amaze your body, if you just keep telling yourself, I can do it… I can do it… I can do it!
general.author: jon erikson

general.quote: If you can’t find the key to success, pick the lock.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Enclose your heart in times of need with the steel of your determination and your strength. In doing this, all things will be bearable.
general.author: lora leigh

general.quote: Determine that the thing can and shall be done, and then we shall find the way.
general.author: abraham lincoln

general.quote: Determination gives you the resolve to keep going in spite of the roadblocks that lay before you.
general.author: denis waitley

general.quote: You’ve got to get up every morning with determination if you’re going to go to bed with satisfaction.
general.author: geroge lorimer

general.quote: To succeed in life one must have determination and must be prepared to suffer during the process. If one isn’t prepared to suffer during adversities, I don’t really see how he can be successful.
general.author: gary player

general.quote: Nothing great will ever be achieved without great men, and men are great only if they are determined to be so.
general.author: charles de gaulle

general.quote: Determination is the mental "I will" that gets results.
general.author: wesley a. stanger

general.quote: Give me a lever long enough, and a prop strong enough, I can single-handedly move the world.
general.author: archimedes

general.quote: The man who can drive himself further once the effort gets painful is the man who will win.
general.author: roger bannister

general.quote: There is one quality more important than know-how…. This is know-how by which we determine not only how to accomplish our purposes, but what our purposes are to be.
general.author: norbert weiner

general.quote: Determination that just won’t quit — that’s what it takes.
general.author: aj foyt

general.quote: Real leaders are ordinary people with extraordinary determination.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: When you locate good in yourself, approve of it with determination. When you locate evil in yourself, despise it as something detestable.
general.author: confucius

general.quote: What this power is i cannot say; all i know is that it exists and it becomes available only when a man is in that state of mind in which he knows exactly what he wants and is fully determined not to quit until he finds it.
general.author: alexander graham bell

general.quote: If you must begin, then go all the way, because if you begin and quit, the unfinished business you have left behind begins to haunt you all the time.
general.author: chogyam trungpa

general.quote: The surest way to fail is not to determine to succeed.
general.author: richard brinsley sheridan

general.quote: Determination is the fuel that propels one to higher virtues.
general.author: aaidh ibn abdullah al-qarni

general.quote: Be determined to handle any challenge in a way that will make you grow.
general.author: les brown

general.quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
general.author: vince lombardi

general.quote: Determine what specific goal you want to achieve. Then dedicate yourself to its attainment with unswerving singleness of purpose, the trenchant zeal of a crusader.
general.author: paul j. meyer

general.quote: Construct your Determination with Sustained Effort, Controlled Attention, and Concentrated Energy. opportunities never come to those who wait… they are captured by those who dare to attack.
general.author: paul j. meyer

general.quote: Those who want to succeed will find a way, those who don’t will find an excuse!
general.author: leo aguila

general.quote: You can do what you have to do, and sometimes you can do it even better than you think you can.
general.author: jimmy carter

general.quote: Only a man who knows what it is like to be defeated can reach down to the bottom of his soul and come up with the extra ounce of power it takes to win when the match is even.
general.author: muhammad ali

general.quote: In truth, people can generally make time for what they choose to do; it is not really the time but the will that is lacking.
general.author: sir john lubbock

general.quote: I’m a determined person. And if I’ve got an objective, I’ll make hours of sacrifice — whatever efforts are needed.
general.author: gerald r. ford

general.author: thomas fuller

general.quote: He who chooses the beginning of a road chooses the place it leads to. It is the means that determine the end.
general.author: harry emerson fosdick

general.quote: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
general.author: les brown

general.quote: Determination is the thing on which you can depend. It plods along without a swing, but gets there in the end.
general.author: edgar guest

general.quote: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline, and effort.
general.author: jesse owens

general.quote: So we built the wall and the whole wall was joined together to half its height; for the people had a mind to work.
general.author: bible

general.quote: The longer I live, the more I am certain that the great difference between the great and the insignificant, is energy — The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person’s determination.
general.author: tommy lasorda

general.quote: A determined heart takes no counsel.
general.author: quiros

general.quote: Human beings, by changing the inner attitudes of their minds, can change the outer aspects of their lives.
general.author: william james

general.quote: Resolve will melt no rocks. But it can scale them.
general.author: george eliot

general.quote: A man can do anything he wants to do in this world, at least if he wants to do it badly enough.
general.author: edward wyllis scripps

general.quote: Nothing is so common as unsuccessful men with talent. They lack only determination.
general.author: charles swindle

general.quote: Never let the fear of striking out get in your way.
general.author: babe ruth

general.quote: You too, can determine what you want. You can decide on your major objectives, targets, aims, and destination.
general.author: w. clement stone

general.quote: It has never been my object to record my dreams, just the determination to realize them.
general.author: man ray

general.quote: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate that can circumvent or hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.
general.author: ella wheeler wilcox

general.quote: If at first you don’t succeed-try, try again. Don’t think of it as failure. Think of it as timed-release success.
general.author: robert orben

general.quote: Determination is the wake-up call to the human will.
general.author: anthony robbins

general.quote: I will go anywhere, provided it be forward.
general.author: david livingstone

general.quote: A person who knows how to laugh at himself will never cease to be amused.
general.author: shirley maclaine

general.quote: People who stop laughing are always the ones who get hurt.
general.author: josh sundquist

general.quote: Then let us laugh. It is the cheapest luxury man enjoys, and, as Charles Lamb says, "is worth a hundred groans in any state of the market.
general.author: william matthews

general.quote: You can’t stay mad at somebody who makes you laugh.
general.author: jay leno

general.quote: They laugh that win!
general.author: william shakespeare

general.quote: Men will let you abuse them if only you will make them laugh.
general.author: henry ward beecher

general.quote: Only in this world do we laugh: in hell, it won’t be possible; and in heaven, it won’t be proper.
general.author: jules renard

general.quote: The most completely wasted of all days is that in which we have not laughed.
general.author: nicolas chamfort

general.quote: To listen to some devout people, one would imagine that God never laughs.
general.author: ghose aurobindo

general.quote: He deserves Paradise who makes his companions laugh.
general.author: the holy koran

general.quote: A laugh costs too much when bought at the expense of virtue.
general.author: quintilian

general.quote: Beware of him who hates the laugh of a child.
general.author: johann kaspar lavater

general.quote: I can usually judge a fellow by what he laughs at.
general.author: wilson mizner

general.quote: You enjoy it more if you can laugh at it.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: He laughs best who laughs last.
general.author: john vanbrugh

general.quote: We sometimes laugh from ear to ear, but it would be impossible for a smile to be wider than the distance between our eyes.
general.author: malcolm de chazal

general.quote: I’ve always thought that a big laugh is a really loud noise from the soul saying, "Ain’t that the truth.
general.author: quincy jones

general.quote: If you lose the power to laugh, you lose the power to think.
general.author: clarence darrow

general.quote: By nothing do men show their character more than by the things they laugh at.
general.author: johann wolfgang von goethe

general.quote: When you laugh, be sure to laugh at what people do and not at what people are.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Man is the only animal that laughs and weeps; for he is the only animal that is struck with the difference between what things are and what they might have been.
general.author: william hazlitt

general.quote: The best way to make your audience laugh is to start laughing yourself.
general.author: oliver goldsmith

general.quote: A laugh is a smile that bursts.
general.author: mary h. waldrip

general.quote: He who laughs last didn’t get the joke at first.
general.author: evan esar

general.quote: He who laughs best today, will also laugh last.
general.author: friedrich nietzsche

general.quote: Laugh at your friends, and if your friends are sore; So much the better, you may laugh the more.
general.author: alexander pope

general.quote: The man that loves and laughs must sure do well.
general.author: alexander pope

general.quote: When a person can no longer laugh at himself, it is time for others to laugh at him.
general.author: thomas szasz

general.quote: A laughing fool … seems born for nothing but to show his teeth.
general.author: george pope morris

general.quote: No one will be more profoundly sad than he who laughs too much.
general.author: jean paul friedrich richter

general.quote: The flower in the vase smiles, but no longer laughs.
general.author: malcolm de chazal

general.quote: She laughs at everything you say. Why? Because she has fine teeth.
general.author: benjamin franklin

general.quote: His own heart laughed: and that was quite enough for him.
general.author: charles dickens

general.quote: No man heartily hates him at who he can laugh.
general.author: samuel johnson

general.quote: A laugh a day keeps the psychiatrist away.
general.author: evan esar

general.quote: Life without laughing is a dreary blank.
general.author: william makepeace thackeray

general.quote: He is not always at ease who laughs.
general.author: charles de marguetel de saint-denis de saint-evremond

general.quote: Men show their character in nothing more clearly than by what they think laughable.
general.author: johann wolfgang von goethe

general.quote: We must laugh before we are happy, for fear we die before we laugh at all.
general.author: jean de la bruyere

general.quote: A good time to laugh is any time you can.
general.author: linda ellerbee

general.quote: I hasten to laugh at everything for fear of being obliged to weep.
general.author: pierre de beaumarchais

general.quote: The laughers are a majority.
general.author: alexander pope

general.quote: It is a good thing to laugh, at any rate; and if a straw can tickle a man, it is an instrument of happiness.
general.author: john dryden

general.quote: If you don’t learn to laugh at trouble, you won’t have anything to laugh at when you grow old.
general.author: edgar watson howe

general.quote: The earth laughs in flowers.
general.author: ee cummings

general.quote: To laugh is proper to man.
general.author: francois rabelais

general.quote: I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it’s the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It’s probably the most important thing in a person.
general.author: audrey hepburn

general.quote: We do not stop laughing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop laughing.
general.author: evan esar

general.quote: A laugh is worth a hundred groans in any market.
general.author: charles lamb

general.quote: Laugh and the world laughs with you, weep and you weep alone.
general.author: ella wheeler wilcox

general.quote: I found people looked better when they laughed.
general.author: mort sahl

general.quote: Man, when you lose your laugh you lose your footing.
general.author: ken kesey

general.quote: It’s hard … to hate a man who laughs at himself and the rest of the world.
general.author: jo clayton

general.quote: No one is laughable who laughs at himself.
general.author: marcus annaeus seneca

general.quote: The man who laughs has simply not yet had the terrible news.
general.author: bertolt brecht

general.quote: Always laugh heartily at the jokes your boss tells, it maybe a loyalty test.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: That is the saving grace of humor, if you fail no one is laughing at you.
general.author: a. whitney brown

general.quote: He who laughs … lasts.
general.author: erma bombeck

general.quote: If I am not allowed to laugh in heaven, I don’t want to go there.
general.author: martin luther

general.quote: Men are contented to be laughed at for their wit, but not for their folly.
general.author: jonathan swift

general.quote: The most wasted of all days is that on which one has not laughed.
general.author: sebastien-roch nicolas de chamfort

general.quote: More people laugh at us than with us, however it may appear at the moment.
general.author: giovanni ruffini

general.quote: It is easier to make people cry than to make them laugh.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Whatever you laugh at in others, laughs at yourself.
general.author: harry emerson fosdick

general.quote: We don’t laugh because we’re happy — we’re happy because we laugh.
general.author: william james

general.quote: The joke loses everything when the joker laughs himself.
general.author: friedrich schiller

general.quote: It is more fitting for a man to laugh at life than to lament over it.
general.author: marcus annaeus seneca

general.quote: You grow up on the day you have your first real laugh at, yourself.
general.author: ethel barrymore

general.quote: Nothing shows a man’s character more than what he laughs at.
general.author: johann wolfgang von goethe

general.quote: He who laughs on Friday will weep on Sunday.
general.author: jean baptiste racine

general.quote: Laugh at yourself first, before anyone else can.
general.author: elsa maxwell

general.quote: There can never be enough said of the virtues, dangers, the power of a shared laugh.
general.author: françoise sagan

general.quote: One loses many laughs by not laughing at oneself.
general.author: sara jeannette duncan

general.quote: A laugh’s the wisest, easiest answer to all that’s queer.
general.author: herman melville

general.quote: The loud laugh that spoke the vacant mind.
general.author: oliver goldsmith

general.quote: A good laugh is sunshine in a house.
general.author: william makepeace thackeray

general.quote: No one is more profoundly sad as one who laughs too much.
general.author: jean paul richter

general.quote: Life is worth living as long as there’s a laugh in it.
general.author: lucy maud montgomery

general.quote: A good laugh makes any interview, or any conversation, so much better.
general.author: barbara walters

general.quote: You can judge a man by what he laughs at.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: A gentleman is often seen, but very seldom heard to laugh.
general.author: philip dormer stanhope

general.quote: If you want to tell people the truth, make them laugh, otherwise they’ll kill you.
general.author: oscar wilde

general.quote: A man isn’t poor if he can still laugh.
general.author: raymond hitchcock

general.quote: Nothing is sillier than a silly laugh.
general.author: caius quintus valerius catullus

general.quote: The laughter of man is more terrible than his tears, and takes more forms — hollow, heartless, mirthless, maniacal.
general.author: james thurber

general.quote: Learn to laugh at your troubles and you’ll never run out of things to laugh at.
general.author: lyn karol

general.quote: If we couldn’t laugh, we would all go insane.
general.author: jimmy buffet

general.quote: No man who has once heartily and wholly laughed can be altogether irreclaimably bad.
general.author: thomas carlyle

general.quote: He is a wise man who always knows what to laugh at, and a bold man that always dare laugh at what is laughable.
general.author: edward parsons day

general.quote: The power of man has grown in every sphere, except over himself.
general.author: winston churchill quotes

general.quote: What is good? All that heightens the feeling of power, the will to power, power itself in man.
general.author: friedrich nietzsche

general.quote: Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.
general.author: epictetus

general.quote: Their insatiable lust for power is only equaled by their incurable impotence in exercising it.
general.author: winston churchill

general.quote: Longer in your power – he’s free again.
general.author: aleksander solzhenitsyn

general.quote: Only through destroying myself can I discover the greater power of my spirit.
general.author: chuck palahniuk

general.quote: The only way to predict the future is to have power to shape the future.
general.author: eric hoffer

general.quote: Power does not corrupt men; fools, however, if they get into a position of power, corrupt power.
general.author: george bernard shaw quotes

general.quote: Power is my mistress. I have worked too hard at her conquest to allow anyone to take her away from me.
general.author: napoleon bonaparte quotes

general.quote: The steps of power are often steps on sand.
general.author: edward counsel

general.quote: All I want is a warm bed and a kind word and unlimited power.
general.author: ashleigh brilliant

general.quote: There is no knowledge that is not power.
general.author: ralph waldo emerson

general.quote: Power is when you have every justification to kill someone, and then you don’t.
general.author: oskar shindler

general.quote: Power is not only what you have but what the enemy thinks you have.
general.author: saul alinsky

general.quote: I am not interested in power for power’s sake, but I’m interested in power that is moral, that is right and that is good.
general.author: martin luther king, jr.

general.quote: Each one of us has the power to make others feel better or worse. Making others feel better is much more fun than making others feel worse. Making others feel better generally makes us feel better.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: He, who is devoid of the power to forgive, is devoid of the power to love.
general.author: martin luther king, jr.

general.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
general.author: alice walker

general.quote: Power is not alluring to pure minds.
general.author: thomas jefferson quotes

general.quote: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man’s character, give him power.
general.author: abraham lincoln quotes

general.quote: Knowledge is power.
general.author: francis bacon

general.quote: The secret of power is the knowledge that others are more cowardly than you are.
general.author: ludwig borne

general.quote: The power of a thing or an act is in the meaning and the understanding.
general.author: nicholas black elk

general.quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace.
general.author: jimi hendrix

general.quote: We have the power to make this the best generation of mankind in the history of the world – or to make it the last.
general.author: john fitzgerald kennedy

general.quote: Anyone can become angry – that is easy, but to be angry with the right person at the right time, and for the right purpose and in the right way – that is not within everyone’s power and that is not easy.
general.author: aristotle quotes

general.quote: Never forget the three powerful resources you always have available to you: love, prayer, and forgiveness.
general.author: h. jackson brown, jr.

general.quote: If you realized how powerful your thoughts are, you would never think a negative thought.
general.author: peace pilgrim

general.quote: I hope our wisdom will grow with our power, and teach us that the less we use our power the greater it will be.
general.author: thomas jefferson

general.quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
general.author: leo f. buscaglia

general.quote: Between stimulus and response is our greatest power – the freedom to choose.
general.author: stephen r. covey

general.quote: He who controls others may be powerful, but he who has mastered himself is mightier still.
general.author: lao tzu

general.quote: The greater the power, the more dangerous the abuse.
general.author: edmund burke

general.quote: The attempt to combine wisdom and power has only rarely been successful and then only for a short while.
general.author: albert einstein

general.quote: Power gradually extirpates for the mind every humane and gentle virtue.
general.author: edmund burke

general.quote: In order to obtain and hold power, a man must love it.
general.author: leo tolstoy

general.quote: Promise, large promise, is the soul of an advertisement.
general.author: samuel johnson

general.quote: Promises may fit the friends, but non-performance will turn them into enemies.
