general.quote: The really unhappy person is the one who leaves undone what they can do, and starts doing what they don't understand; no wonder they come to grief.
general.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

general.quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: I do not believe in a fate that falls on men however they act; but I do believe in a fate that falls on man unless they act.
general.author: G. K. Chesterton

general.quote: If you propose to speak, always ask yourself, is it true, is it necessary, is it kind.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: Risk more than others think is safe. Care more than others think is wise. Dream more than others think is practical.Expect more than others think is possible.
general.author: Cadet Maxim

general.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
general.author: Og Mandino

general.quote: Let go of your attachment to being right, and suddenly your mind is more open. You're able to benefit from the unique viewpoints of others, without being crippled by your own judgement.
general.author: Ralph Marston

general.quote: Wrinkles should merely indicate where smiles have been.
general.author: Mark Twain

general.quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
general.author: Zig Ziglar

general.quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the stronger pull of what you really love.
general.author: Rumi

general.quote: I gave my life to become the person I am right now. Was it worth it?
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: Give thanks for a little and you will find a lot.
general.author: Hausa

general.quote: Your ability to learn faster than your competition is your only sustainable competitive advantage.
general.author: Arie de Gues

general.quote: Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
general.author: Paul Boese

general.quote: Let the future tell the truth, and evaluate each one according to his work and accomplishments. The present is theirs; the future, for which I have really worked, is mine.
general.author: Nikola Tesla

general.quote: Moral excellence comes about as a result of habit. We become just by doing just acts, temperate by doing temperate acts, brave by doing brave acts.
general.author: Aristotle

general.quote: The deepest craving of human nature is the need to be appreciated.
general.author: William James

general.quote: Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking together in the same direction.
general.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

general.quote: We have committed the Golden Rule to memory; let us now commit it to life.
general.author: Edwin Markham

general.quote: It is with words as with sunbeams. The more they are condensed, the deeper they burn.
general.author: Robert Southey

general.quote: When people are like each other they tend to like each other.
general.author: Tony Robbins

general.quote: Sincerity is the way of Heaven. The attainment of sincerity is the way of men.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Be the change that you want to see in the world.
general.author: Mohandas Gandhi

general.quote: The more you care, the stronger you can be.
general.author: Jim Rohn

general.quote: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
general.author: Oprah Winfrey

general.quote: Just trust yourself, then you will know how to live.
general.author: Goethe

general.quote: To be fully alive, fully human, and completely awake is to be continually thrown out of the nest.
general.author: Pema Chodron

general.quote: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
general.author: Jim Rohn

general.quote: It all depends on how we look at things, and not how they are in themselves.
general.author: Carl Jung

general.quote: Giving up doesn't always mean you are weak; sometimes it means that you are strong enough to let go.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: To climb steep hills requires a slow pace at first.
general.author: William Shakespeare

general.quote: An idea that is developed and put into action is more important than an idea that exists only as an idea.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: It is not the possession of truth, but the success which attends the seeking after it, that enriches the seeker and brings happiness to him.
general.author: Max Planck

general.quote: Truth is generally the best vindication against slander.
general.author: Abraham Lincoln

general.quote: To follow, without halt, one aim: There is the secret of success.
general.author: Anna Pavlova

general.quote: And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same.
general.author: Nelson Mandela

general.quote: What is a weed? A plant whose virtues have not yet been discovered.
general.author: Ralph Emerson

general.quote: Belief consists in accepting the affirmations of the soul; Unbelief, in denying them.
general.author: Ralph Emerson

general.quote: Many people have gone further than they thought they could because someone else thought they could.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: We read the world wrong and say that it deceives us.
general.author: Rabindranath Tagore

general.quote: If only wed stop trying to be happy wed have a pretty good time.
general.author: Edith Wharton

general.quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
general.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

general.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: The mark of your ignorance is the depth of your belief in injustice and tragedy. What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the Master calls the butterfly.
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: I am glad that I paid so little attention to good advice; had I abided by it I might have been saved from some of my most valuable mistakes.
general.author: Edna Millay

general.quote: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
general.author: Abraham Lincoln

general.quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
general.author: Oliver Holmes

general.quote: The person who makes a success of living is the one who see his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly. That is dedication.
general.author: Cecil B. DeMille

general.quote: My reputation grows with every failure.
general.author: George Shaw

general.quote: Good thoughts are no better than good dreams, unless they be executed.
general.author: Ralph Emerson

general.quote: Happiness does not come about only due to external circumstances; it mainly derives from inner attitudes.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: However many holy words you read, however many you speak, what good will they do you if you do not act on upon them?
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
general.author: Harry Banks

general.quote: If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters. Excellence is not an exception, it is a prevailing attitude.
general.author: Colin Powell

general.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: Better than a thousand hollow words is one word that brings peace.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: The possibilities are numerous once we decide to act and not react.
general.author: George Bernard Shaw

general.quote: Almost everything comes from nothing.
general.author: Henri Amiel

general.quote: Sometimes by losing a battle you find a new way to win the war.
general.author: Donald Trump

general.quote: Listen to what you know instead of what you fear.
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: It is easier to live through someone else than to become complete yourself.
general.author: Betty Friedan

general.quote: If you're in a bad situation, don't worry it'll change. If you're in a good situation, don't worry it'll change.
general.author: John Simone

general.quote: Remember that failure is an event, not a person.
general.author: Zig Ziglar

general.quote: Don't settle for a relationship that won't let you be yourself.
general.author: Oprah Winfrey

general.quote: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the master calls a butterfly.
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: Instead of saying that man is the creature of circumstance, it would be nearer the mark to say that man is the architect of circumstance.
general.author: Thomas Carlyle

general.quote: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.
general.author: Tony Robbins

general.quote: Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person.
general.author: Mother Teresa

general.quote: Knowledge has three degrees opinion, science, illumination. The means or instrument of the first is sense; of the second, dialectic; of the third, intuition.
general.author: Plotinus

general.quote: Love vanquishes time. To lovers, a moment can be eternity, eternity can be the tick of a clock.
general.author: Mary Parrish

general.quote: We never live; we are always in the expectation of living.
general.author: Voltaire

general.quote: Think like a man of action; act like a man of thought.
general.author: Henri L. Bergson

general.quote: You can complain because roses have thorns, or you can rejoice because thorns have roses.
general.author: Ziggy

general.quote: There is not one big cosmic meaning for all, there is only the meaning we each give to our life.
general.author: Anais Nin

general.quote: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
general.author: Lao Tzu

general.quote: Time you enjoyed wasting was not wasted.
general.author: John Lennon

general.quote: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.
general.author: Albert Camus

general.quote: Genuine sincerity opens people's hearts, while manipulation causes them to close.
general.author: Daisaku Ikeda

general.quote: To give ones self earnestly to the duties due to men, and, while respecting spiritual beings, to keep aloof from them, may be called wisdom.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: A man's dreams are an index to his greatness.
general.author: Zadok Rabinowitz

general.quote: This is the final test of a gentleman: his respect for those who can be of no possible value to him.
general.author: William Lyon Phelps

general.quote: You teach best what you most need to learn.
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: Continuous effort, not strength or intelligence is the key to unlocking our potential.
general.author: Winston Churchill

general.quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.
general.author: Henry Ford

general.quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Never tell a young person that anything cannot be done. God may have been waiting centuries for someone ignorant enough of the impossible to do that very thing.
general.author: John Holmes

general.quote: Bold is not the act of foolishness but the attribute and inner strength to act when others will not so as to move forward not backward.
general.author: Byron Pulsifer

general.quote: If we look at the world with a love of life, the world will reveal its beauty to us.
general.author: Daisaku Ikeda

general.quote: In skating over thin ice our safety is in our speed.
general.author: Ralph Emerson

general.quote: When you discover your mission, you will feel its demand. It will fill you with enthusiasm and a burning desire to get to work on it.
general.author: W. Clement Stone

general.quote: Never promise more than you can perform.
general.author: Publilius Syrus

general.quote: If you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it. If you don't ask, the answer is always no. If you don't step forward, you're always in the same place.
general.author: Nora Roberts

general.quote: I can't believe that God put us on this earth to be ordinary.
general.author: Lou Holtz

general.quote: There are no limitations to the mind except those we acknowledge.
general.author: Napoleon Hill

general.quote: It is through science that we prove, but through intuition that we discover.
general.author: Jules Poincare

general.quote: Don't be dismayed by good-byes. A farewell is necessary before you can meet again. And meeting again, after moments or lifetimes, is certain for those who are friends.
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: If someone in your life talked to you the way you talk to yourself, you would have left them long ago.
general.author: Carla Gordon

general.quote: The cosmos is neither moral or immoral; only people are. He who would move the world must first move himself.
general.author: Edward Ericson

general.quote: If you lose today, win tomorrow. In this never-ending spirit of challenge is the heart of a victor.
general.author: Daisaku Ikeda

general.quote: There is a way that nature speaks, that land speaks. Most of the time we are simply not patient enough, quiet enough, to pay attention to the story.
general.author: Linda Hogan

general.quote: Never tell me the sky is the limit when there are footprints on the moon.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: I cannot say whether things will get better if we change; what I can say is they must change if they are to get better.
general.author: Georg Lichtenberg

general.quote: The greater part of human pain is unnecessary. It is self-created as long as the unobserved mind runs your life.
general.author: Eckhart Tolle

general.quote: Take it easy but take it.
general.author: Woody Guthrie

general.quote: Blessed is the man who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
general.author: Alexander Pope

general.quote: He who knows others is wise. He who knows himself is enlightened.
general.author: Lao Tzu

general.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
general.author: Peter Drucker

general.quote: A garden is always a series of losses set against a few triumphs, like life itself.
general.author: May Sarton

general.quote: If facts are the seeds that later produce knowledge and wisdom, then the emotions and the impressions of the senses are the fertile soil in which the seeds must grow.
general.author: Rachel Carson

general.quote: Never mistake motion for action.
general.author: Ernest Hemingway

general.quote: One needs something to believe in, something for which one can have whole-hearted enthusiasm. One needs to feel that ones life has meaning, that one is needed in this world.
general.author: Hannah Senesh

general.quote: One who is too insistent on his own views, finds few to agree with him.
general.author: Lao Tzu

general.quote: Translation is the paradigm, the exemplar of all writing. It is translation that demonstrates most vividly the yearning for transformation that underlies every act involving speech, that supremely human gift.
general.author: Harry Burchell Mathews

general.quote: Meditation is the dissolution of thoughts in eternal awareness or Pure consciousness without objectification, knowing without thinking, merging finitude in infinity.
general.author: Voltaire

general.quote: The reasonable man adapts himself to the world; the unreasonable man persists in trying to adapt the world to himself. Therefore, all progress depends on the unreasonable man.
general.author: George Shaw

general.quote: Good instincts usually tell you what to do long before your head has figured it out.
general.author: Michael Burke

general.quote: It isn't what happens to us that causes us to suffer; it's what we say to ourselves about what happens.
general.author: Pema Chodron

general.quote: Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
general.author: Edgar Allan Poe

general.quote: We cannot hold a torch to light another's path without brightening our own.
general.author: Ben Sweetland

general.quote: You are never given a wish without also being given the power to make it come true. You may have to work for it, however.
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
general.author: Mother Teresa

general.quote: Count your joys instead of your woes. Count your friends instead of your foes.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Dreams come true. Without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them.
general.author: John Updike

general.quote: Staying in one place is the best path to be taken over and surpassed by many.
general.author: Byron Pulsifer

general.quote: Imagination will often carry us to worlds that never were. But without it we go nowhere.
general.author: Carl Sagan

general.quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
general.author: Helen Keller

general.quote: A leader or a man of action in a crisis almost always acts subconsciously and then thinks of the reasons for his action.
general.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

general.quote: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: I endeavour to be wise when I cannot be merry, easy when I cannot be glad, content with what cannot be mended and patient when there is no redress.
general.author: Elizabeth Montagu

general.quote: The height of your accomplishments will equal the depth of your convictions.
general.author: William Scolavino

general.quote: If I am not for myself, who will be for me? If I am not for others, what am I? And if not now, when?
general.author: Rabbi Hillel

general.quote: When I dare to be powerful, to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.
general.author: Audre Lorde

general.quote: All great men are gifted with intuition. They know without reasoning or analysis, what they need to know.
general.author: Alexis Carrel

general.quote: To get the full value of joy you must have someone to divide it with.
general.author: Mark Twain

general.quote: Sometimes our fate resembles a fruit tree in winter. Who would think that those branches would turn green again and blossom, but we hope it, we know it.
general.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

general.quote: We lost because we told ourselves we lost.
general.author: Leo Tolstoy

general.quote: Success is determined by those whom prove the impossible, possible.
general.author: James Pence

general.quote: Good advice is always certain to be ignored, but that's no reason not to give it.
general.author: Agatha Christie

general.quote: The winner ain't the one with the fastest car it's the one who refuses to lose.
general.author: Dale Earnhardt

general.quote: Spirituality can be severed from both vicious sectarianism and thoughtless banalities. Spirituality, I have come to see, is nothing less than the thoughtful love of life.
general.author: Robert C. Solomon

general.quote: No one has a finer command of language than the person who keeps his mouth shut.
general.author: Sam Rayburn

general.quote: The only person who never makes mistakes is the person who never does anything.
general.author: Denis Waitley

general.quote: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
general.author: John Lennon

general.quote: Discovery consists of seeing what everybody has seen and thinking what nobody else has thought.
general.author: Jonathan Swift

general.quote: If you have knowledge, let others light their candles in it.
general.author: Margaret Fuller

general.quote: It is impossible for a man to learn what he thinks he already knows.
general.author: Epictetus

general.quote: If you find yourself in a hole, the first thing to do is stop digging.
general.author: Will Rogers

general.quote: To make no mistakes is not in the power of man; but from their errors and mistakes the wise and good learn wisdom for the future.
general.author: Plutarch

general.quote: I think you can have moderate success by copying something else, but if you really want to knock it out of the park, you have to do something different and take chances.
general.author: Lee Womack

general.quote: Everything we hear is an opinion, not a fact. Everything we see is a perspective, not the truth.
general.author: Marcus Aurelius

general.quote: Six essential qualities that are the key to success: Sincerity, personal integrity, humility, courtesy, wisdom, charity.
general.author: William Menninger

general.quote: I have an everyday religion that works for me. Love yourself first, and everything else falls into line.
general.author: Lucille Ball

general.quote: Flow with whatever is happening and let your mind be free. Stay centred by accepting whatever you are doing. This is the ultimate.
general.author: Chuang Tzu

general.quote: Nothing could be worse than the fear that one had given up too soon, and left one unexpended effort that might have saved the world.
general.author: Jane Addams

general.quote: The energy of the mind is the essence of life.
general.author: Aristotle

general.quote: Begin, be bold, and venture to be wise.
general.author: Horace

general.quote: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach him how to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
general.author: Lao Tzu

general.quote: A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds.
general.author: Francis Bacon

general.quote: Slow down and enjoy life. It's not only the scenery you miss by going too fast you also miss the sense of where you are going and why.
general.author: Eddie Cantor

general.quote: Miracles come in moments. Be ready and willing.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Numberless are the worlds wonders, but none more wonderful than man.
general.author: Sophocles

general.quote: So is cheerfulness, or a good temper, the more it is spent, the more remains.
general.author: Ralph Emerson

general.quote: The true way to render ourselves happy is to love our work and find in it our pleasure.
general.author: Francoise de Motteville

general.quote: When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Argue for your limitations, and sure enough they're yours.
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: He who wishes to secure the good of others, has already secured his own.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Wise men talk because they have something to say; fools, because they have to say something.
general.author: Plato

general.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: The future is an opaque mirror. Anyone who tries to look into it sees nothing but the dim outlines of an old and worried face.
general.author: Jim Bishop

general.quote: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to a better understanding of ourselves.
general.author: Carl Jung

general.quote: Beware of the half truth. You may have gotten hold of the wrong half.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
general.author: Elbert Hubbard

general.quote: I have never been hurt by anything I didn't say.
general.author: Calvin Coolidge

general.quote: Be not angry that you cannot make others as you wish them to be, since you cannot make yourself as you wish to be.
general.author: Thomas Kempis

general.quote: Adversity causes some men to break, others to break records.
general.author: William Ward

general.quote: An invincible determination can accomplish almost anything and in this lies the great distinction between great men and little men.
general.author: Thomas Fuller

general.quote: The industrial landscape is already littered with remains of once successful companies that could not adapt their strategic vision to altered conditions of competition.
general.author: Abernathy

general.quote: Example has more followers than reason.
general.author: Christian Bovee

general.quote: One that desires to excel should endeavour in those things that are in themselves most excellent.
general.author: Epictetus

general.quote: If you have made mistakes, there is always another chance for you. You may have a fresh start any moment you choose.
general.author: Mary Pickford

general.quote: The only Zen you find on the tops of mountains is the Zen you bring up there.
general.author: Robert Pirsig

general.quote: Gratitude is riches. Complaint is poverty.
general.author: Doris Day

general.quote: Strong people make as many mistakes as weak people. Difference is that strong people admit their mistakes, laugh at them, learn from them. That is how they become strong.
general.author: Richard Needham

general.quote: To know your purpose is to live a life of direction, and in that direction is found peace and tranquillity.
general.author: Byron Pulsifer

general.quote: You can stand tall without standing on someone. You can be a victor without having victims.
general.author: Harriet Woods

general.quote: Bad times have a scientific value. These are occasions a good learner would not miss.
general.author: Ralph Emerson

general.quote: It's not who you are that holds you back, it's who you think you're not.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: All children are artists. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
general.author: Pablo Picasso

general.quote: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.
general.author: Philip Sidney

general.quote: He who knows that enough is enough will always have enough.
general.author: Lao Tzu

general.quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
general.author: Ralph Emerson

general.quote: If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant; if we did not sometimes taste of adversity, prosperity would not be so welcome.
general.author: Anne Bradstreet

general.quote: Joy is what happens to us when we allow ourselves to recognize how good things really are.
general.author: Marianne Williamson

general.quote: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
general.author: Carl Jung

general.quote: There is never enough time to do everything, but there is always enough time to do the most important thing.
general.author: Brian Tracy

general.quote: You really can change the world if you care enough.
general.author: Marian Edelman

general.quote: What you are is what you have been. What you will be is what you do now.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: Our lives are the only meaningful expression of what we believe and in Whom we believe. And the only real wealth, for any of us, lies in our faith.
general.author: Gordon Hinckley

general.quote: There surely is in human nature an inherent propensity to extract all the good out of all the evil.
general.author: Benjamin Haydon

general.quote: Music in the soul can be heard by the universe.
general.author: Lao Tzu

general.quote: What we see depends mainly on what we look for.
general.author: John Lubbock

general.quote: To hell with circumstances; I create opportunities.
general.author: Bruce Lee

general.quote: The truest greatness lies in being kind, the truest wisdom in a happy mind.
general.author: Ella Wilcox

general.quote: An ounce of emotion is equal to a ton of facts.
general.author: John Junor

general.quote: We need to find the courage to say NO to the things and people that are not serving us if we want to rediscover ourselves and live our lives with authenticity.
general.author: Barbara De Angelis

general.quote: Great is the art of beginning, but greater is the art of ending.
general.author: Lazurus Long

general.quote: Simply put, you believer that things or people make you unhappy, but this is not accurate. You make yourself unhappy.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
general.author: Maya Angelou

general.quote: Our ability to achieve happiness and success depends on the strength of our wings.
general.author: Catherine Pulsifer

general.quote: To go against the dominant thinking of your friends, of most of the people you see every day, is perhaps the most difficult act of heroism you can perform.
general.author: Theodore H. White

general.quote: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
general.author: Melody Beattie

general.quote: Into each life rain must fall but rain can be the giver of life and it is all in your attitude that makes rain produce sunshine.
general.author: Byron Pulsifer

general.quote: We are all inclined to judge ourselves by our ideals; others, by their acts.
general.author: Harold Nicolson

general.quote: Nothing is a waste of time if you use the experience wisely.
general.author: Rodin

general.quote: If one way be better than another, that you may be sure is natures way.
general.author: Aristotle

general.quote: Here is one quality that one must possess to win, and that is definiteness of purpose, the knowledge of what one wants, and a burning desire to possess it.
general.author: Napoleon Hill

general.quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
general.author: William Shakespeare

general.quote: Using the power of decision gives you the capacity to get past any excuse to change any and every part of your life in an instant.
general.author: Tony Robbins

general.quote: I will prepare and some day my chance will come.
general.author: Abraham Lincoln

general.quote: Sometimes the cards we are dealt are not always fair. However you must keep smiling and moving on.
general.author: Tom Jackson

general.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
general.author: Dr. Suess

general.quote: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
general.author: Carl Jung

general.quote: The scariest moment is always just before you start.
general.author: Stephen King

general.quote: The wisest men follow their own direction.
general.author: Euripides

general.quote: Little by little, one travels far.
general.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

general.quote: I exist as I am, that is enough.
general.author: Walt Whitman

general.quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
general.author: William Shakespeare

general.quote: Great things never came from comfort zones.
general.author: Neil Strauss

general.quote: Paths are made by walking.
general.author: Franz Kafka

general.quote: Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Learn to sell. Learn to build. If you can do both, you will be unstoppable.
general.author: Naval Ravikant

general.quote: From error to error one discovers the entire truth.
general.author: Sigmund Freud

general.quote: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Learn to be calm and you will always be happy.
general.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

general.quote: It will be the toughest thing you'll ever do, but your heart is never wrong.
general.author: Maxime Lagacé

general.quote: An ounce of action is worth a ton of theory.
general.author: Friedrich Engels

general.quote: Diligence is the mother of good fortune.
general.author: Miguel de Cervantes

general.quote: Live your beliefs and you can turn the world around.
general.author: Henry David Thoreau

general.quote: Say no to instant gratification so you can say yes to massive long-term gains.
general.author: Maxime Lagacé

general.quote: You are the person you have been waiting for.
general.author: Joe Dispenza

general.quote: Begin now to be what you will be hereafter.
general.author: Saint Jerome

general.quote: Everything is possible. The impossible just takes longer.
general.author: Dan Brown

general.quote: The brain is wider than the sky.
general.author: Emily Dickinson

general.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
general.author: Robert Frost

general.quote: If you are free, you need to free somebody else. If you have some power, then your job is to empower somebody else.
general.author: Toni Morrison

general.quote: Listen, smile, agree, and then do whatever the fuck you were doing to do anyway.
general.author: Robert Downey Jr

general.quote: Individuals search for truth, groups search for consensus.
general.author: Naval Ravikant

general.quote: The world is full of magic things, patiently waiting for our senses to grow sharper.
general.author: W.B. Yeats

general.quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
general.author: William Shakespeare

general.quote: I have the choice of being constantly active and happy or introspectively passive and sad. Or I can go mad by ricocheting in between.
general.author: Sylvia Plath

general.quote: When you have confidence, you can have a lot of fun. And when you have fun, you can do amazing things.
general.author: Joe Namath

general.quote: There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self.
general.author: Ernest Hemingway

general.quote: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
general.author: Jim Rohn

general.quote: Understand: you are one of a kind. Your character traits are a kind of chemical mix that will never be repeated in history. There are ideas unique to you, a specific rhythm and perspective that are your strengths, not your weaknesses. You must not be afraid of your uniqueness.
general.author: Robert Greene

general.quote: If you're willing to bleed a little every day, you may win big later.
general.author: Naval Ravikant

general.quote: Extreme people get extreme results.
general.author: Sam Altman

general.quote: We have to do the best we are capable of. This is our sacred human responsibility.

general.quote: Take your time, play the long game, embrace the boring, the difficulties, the uncomfortable. This is how it will happen.
general.author: Maxime Lagacé

general.quote: Great things are not accomplished by those who yield to trends and fads and popular opinion.
general.author: Jack Kerouac

general.quote: Adversity reveals genius, prosperity conceals it.
general.author: Horace

general.quote: I would rather be a superb meteor, every atom of me in magnificent glow, than a sleepy and permanent planet.
general.author: Jack London

general.quote: Never confuse a single defeat with a final defeat.
general.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

general.quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.
general.author: Helen Keller

general.quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
general.author: Mahatma Gandhi

general.quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.
general.author: Samuel Beckett

general.quote: A ship is always safe a shore but that is not what it's built for.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you.
general.author: Jesus Christ

general.quote: Shoot for the moon and if you miss you will still be among the stars.
general.author: Les Brown

general.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
general.author: Og Mandino

general.quote: When you know what you want, and want it bad enough, you will find a way to get it.
general.author: Jim Rohn

general.quote: If you don't know where you are going, you will probably end up somewhere else.
general.author: Laurence J. Peter

general.quote: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
general.author: John Wooden

general.quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
general.author: Maya Angelou

general.quote: You don't need to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
general.author: Martin Luther King Jr

general.quote: In order to attain the impossible, one must attempt the absurd.
general.author: Miguel de Cervantes

general.quote: All for one and one for all.
general.author: Alexandre Dumas

general.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
general.author: Aristotle

general.quote: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Whether you believe you can do a thing or not, you are right.
general.author: Henry Ford

general.quote: You have to risk going too far to discover just how far you can really go.
general.author: Jim Rohn

general.quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
general.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

general.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
general.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

general.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: You make your own luck if you stay at it long enough.
general.author: Naval Ravikant

general.quote: If you can imagine it, we can make it.
general.author: John Dykstra

general.quote: Either get busy living or get busy dying.
general.author: Stephen King

general.quote: Seek truth, not comfort.
general.author: Maxime Lagacé

general.quote: Pain or love or danger makes you real again.
general.author: Jack Kerouac

general.quote: Begin, be bold and venture to be wise.
general.author: Horace

general.quote: We are our choices.
general.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

general.quote: A goal should scare you a little and excite you a lot.
general.author: Joe Vitale

general.quote: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.
general.author: Napoleon Hill

general.quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
general.author: T.S. Eliot

general.quote: You can be happy where you are.
general.author: Joel Osteen

general.quote: You change the world by being yourself.
general.author: Yoko Ono

general.quote: They can because they think they can.
general.author: Virgil

general.quote: Fortune sides with him who dares.
general.author: Virgil

general.quote: Resist much, obey little.
general.author: Walt Whitman

general.quote: Men must live and create. Live to the point of tears.
general.author: Albert Camus

general.quote: Live, travel, adventure, bless, and don't be sorry.
general.author: Jack Kerouac

general.quote: And your very flesh shall be a great poem.
general.author: Walt Whitman

general.quote: Our true nationality is mankind.
general.author: H. G. Wells

general.quote: My message to you is simple, keep believing, keep marching, keep building, keep raising your voice.
general.author: Barack Obama

general.quote: Feet, what do I need them for if I have wings to fly.
general.author: Frida Kahlo

general.quote: Never let the odds keep you from doing what you know in your heart you were meant to do.
general.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr

general.quote: Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit.
general.author: E.E. Cummings

general.quote: I want to stay as close to the edge as I can without going over. Out on the edge you see all kinds of things you can't see from the center.
general.author: Kurt Vonnegut

general.quote: f you take risks and face your fate with dignity, there is nothing you can do that makes you small; if you don't take risks, there is nothing you can do that makes you grand, nothing.
general.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

general.quote: We did not come to fear the future. We came here to shape it.
general.author: Barack Obama

general.quote: At the end of the day it's not about what you have or even what you've accomplished… it's about who you've lifted up, who you've made better, it's about what you've given back.
general.author: Denzel Washington

general.quote: Act enthusiastic and you will be enthusiastic.
general.author: Dale Carnegie

general.quote: Magic is believing in yourself, if you can do that, you can make anything happen.
general.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

general.quote: I believe that man will not merely endure; he will prevail.
general.author: William Faulkner

general.quote: We don't rise to the level of our expectations. We fall to the level of our training.
general.author: Archilochus

general.quote: If the doors of perception were cleansed everything would appear to man as it is: infinite.
general.author: William Blake

general.quote: I took a deep breath and listened to the old brag of my heart. I am, I am, I am.
general.author: Sylvia Plath

general.quote: You will find poetry nowhere unless you bring some of it with you.
general.author: Joseph Joubert

general.quote: And above all, watch with glittering eyes the whole world around you because the greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places. Those who don't believe in magic will never find it.
general.author: Roald Dahl

general.quote: The mind is like an iceberg, it floats with one-seventh of its bulk above water.
general.author: Sigmund Freud

general.quote: Build a man a fire, and he'll be warm for a day. Set a man on fire, and he'll be warm for the rest of his life.
general.author: Terry Pratchett

general.quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new lands but seeing with new eyes.
general.author: Marcel Proust

general.quote: Abandon yourself to the moment, and you will find every day new openings, new light, new insight. And those new insights will go on changing you. One day, suddenly you will see you are each moment new.
general.author: Osho

general.quote: You have to be able to tolerate what you don't necessarily like so you can be free.
general.author: Larry Flynt

general.quote: What good is the warmth of summer, without the cold of winter to give it sweetness.
general.author: John Steinbeck

general.quote: Someday, somehow, this will all make sense.
general.author: Maxime Lagacé

general.quote: Better to have, and not need, than to need, and not have.
general.author: Franz Kafka

general.quote: You are free, and that is why you are lost.
general.author: Franz Kafka

general.quote: From a certain point onward there is no longer any turning back. That is the point that must be reached.
general.author: Franz Kafka

general.quote: Don't fight the pain. Accept it, understand it, live it. If you seek pleasure instead you avoid learning.
general.author: Maxime Lagacé

general.quote: You have as much laughter as you have faith.
general.author: Martin Luther

general.quote: We shall not cease from exploration. And the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we started and know the place for the first time.
general.author: T.S. Eliot

general.quote: Rise to the level of your ideals, not the average of your environment.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: There is no great genius without a mixture of madness.
general.author: Aristotle

general.quote: What we call the beginning is often the end. And to make an end is to make a beginning. The end is where we start from.
general.author: T.S. Eliot

general.quote: To find yourself, think for yourself.
general.author: Socrates

general.quote: Cynicism is easy. Mimicry is easy. Optimistic contrarians are the rarest breed.
general.author: Naval Ravikant

general.quote: We are here to laugh at the odds and live our lives so well that Death will tremble to take us.
general.author: Charles Bukowski

general.quote: Unless you believe, you will not understand.
general.author: Augustine of Hippo

general.quote: You will always find an answer in the sound of water.

general.author: Jim Rohn

general.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
general.author: Mark Twain

general.quote: I challenge you to make your life a masterpiece. I challenge you to join the ranks of those people who live what they teach, who walk their talk.
general.author: Anthony Robbins

general.quote: The greater damage for most of us is not that our aim is too high and we miss it, but that it it too low and we reach it.
general.author: Michelangelo

general.quote: Do not go where the path may lead , go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
general.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

general.quote: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough.
general.author: Oprah Winfrey

general.quote: Faith consists in believing when it is beyond the power of reason to believe.
general.author: Voltaire

general.quote: Simplicity is the key to brilliance.
general.author: Bruce Lee

general.quote: There is no end. There is no beginning. There is only the infinite passion of life.
general.author: Federico Fellini

general.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
general.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

general.quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
general.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

general.quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
general.author: Helen Keller

general.quote: We're all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness – and call it love – true love.
general.author: Robert Fulghum

general.quote: People are just as happy as they make up their minds to be.
general.author: Abraham Lincoln

general.quote: The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for.
general.author: Bob Marley

general.quote: It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all – in which case, you fail by default.
general.author: J.K. Rowling

general.quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
general.author: Ayn Rand

general.quote: A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies, said Jojen. The man who never reads lives only one.
general.author: George R.R. Martin

general.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
general.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

general.quote: The more things are forbidden, the more popular they become.
general.author: Mark Twain

general.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
general.author: Lao Tzu

general.quote: If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it. And, like any great relationship, it just gets better and better as the years roll on.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
general.author: George Eliot

general.quote: If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are.
general.author: Ana's Nin

general.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
general.author: Robert A. Heinlein

general.quote: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.
general.author: Mother Teresa

general.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
general.author: A.A. Milne

general.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: It Goes On.
general.author: Robert Frost

general.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
general.author: Mae West

general.quote: Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You.
general.author: Dr. Seuss

general.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth.
general.author: William W. Purkey

general.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
general.author: Mark Twain

general.quote: Life is what happens to us while we are making other plans.
general.author: Allen Saunders

general.quote: Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple.
general.author: Dr. Seuss

general.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
general.author: Dr. Seuss

general.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
general.author: George Bernard Shaw

general.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
general.author: Winston S. Churchill

general.quote: I can't give you a sure-fire formula for success, but I can give you a formula for failure: try to please everybody all the time.
general.author: Herbert Bayard Swope

general.quote: If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. Then quit. No use being a damn fool about it.
general.author: W.C. Fields

general.quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
general.author: Herman Melville

general.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
general.author: Henry David Thoreau

general.quote: As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.
general.author: John Green, The Fault in Our Stars

general.quote: There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.
general.author: Sarah Dessen, The Truth About Forever

general.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
general.author: André Gide, Autumn Leaves

general.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
general.author: Nicholas Sparks, A Walk to Remember

general.quote: If you can make a woman laugh, you can make her do anything.
general.author: Marilyn Monroe

general.quote: We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful about what we pretend to be.
general.author: Kurt Vonnegut, Mother Night

general.quote: The flower that blooms in adversity is the rarest and most beautiful of all.
general.author: Walt Disney Company, Mulan

general.quote: We delight in the beauty of the butterfly, but rarely admit the changes it has gone through to achieve that beauty.
general.author: Maya Angelou

general.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
general.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

general.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
general.author: Thomas A. Edison

general.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Every Saint has a past, Every sinner has a future.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: The old believe everything, the middle aged suspect everything, the Young know everything.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: An idea that is not dangerous is unworthy of being called an idea at all.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Nowadays people know the price of everything and the value of nothing.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Life is too important to be taken seriously.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: To love oneself is the beginning of life long Romance.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Never love anybody that treats you like you're ordinary.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Moderation is a fatal thing. Nothing succeeds like excess.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: No man is rich enough to buy back his past.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: One should always play fairly when one has the winning cards.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Everything popular is wrong.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: The artist is the creator of beautiful things.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: With Freedom Books Flowers and the Moon who could not be happy?
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Women are meant to be loved, not to be understood.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Where there is no love there is no understanding.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Abundance is not something we acquire. It is something we tune into.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: I cannot always control what goes on outside. But I can always control what goes on inside.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: The Laws Of Attraction is this. You don't attract what you want, you attract what you are.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: When you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: When you have a choice whether to be Right or to be Kind, choose to be Kind.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Everything is in motion. Everything flows. Everything is vibrating.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: I am realistic – I expect miracles.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Transformation literally means going beyond your form.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Happiness is not something that you get in Life, happiness is something that you bring to life.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: There is no way to happiness. Happiness is the way.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Happiness is not something that you get in life. Happiness is something that you bring to life.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Judgements prevent us from seeing the good that lies beyond appearances.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you will never see the shadow.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Stop acting as if Life is a rehearsal. Live this day as if it were your last. The past is over and Gone. The future is not guaranteed.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Where there is no love there is no understanding.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you are alone with.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Love is forgiving and love is for giving.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Loving people live in a loving world. Hostile people live in a hostile world. Same world.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: When you live on a round planet, there's no choosing sides.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Peace is the result of retraining your mind to process life as it is, rather than as you think it should be.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Successful people make money. It's not that people who make money become successful, but that successful people attract money. They bring success to what they do.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: The only limits you have all the limits you believe.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: One of the essential principles of living an inspired Life is to remember that our desires don't arrive on our schedule. They arrive when they're supposed to.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: As I unclutter my life, I free myself to answer the callings of my soul.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Don't die with your music still in you.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: You'll see it when you believe it!
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: When you judge another, you do not define Them, you define Yourself.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Be miserable or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: You have to trust in something you are gut, destiny life, karma, whatever this approach has never let me down.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: People think focus means saying yes to the thing you have got to focus on. but that's not what it means at all. it means saying no to the hundred other good ideas that there are. You have to pick careful.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Everyone here has the sense that right now is one of those moments when we are influencing the future.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: My job is not to be easy on people. My job is to make them better.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: If you live each day as if it was your last, someday you will most certainly be right.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Let's go invent tomorrow rather than worrying about what happened yesterday.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They already know what you truly want to become.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Don't let the noise of others opinions drown out your own inner voice.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Deciding what not to do is as important as deciding what to do.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: That is very likely the single best invention of life it is Life's change agent.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: My favourite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet.
general.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

general.quote: Each morning we are born again, what we do today is what matters most.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: Out beyond ideas of wrong doing and right doing there is a field. I'll meet you there. When the soul lies down in that grass the world is too full to talk about.
general.author: Rumi

general.quote: These mountains that you are carrying, you were only supposed to climb.
general.author: Najwa Zebian

general.quote: The quieter you become, the more you can hear.
general.author: Anonymous

general.quote: If you are depressed you are living in the past. If you are anxious you are living in the future. If you are at peace you are living in the present.
general.author: Lao Tzu

general.quote: Stress is an ignorant state. It believes that everything is an emergency. Nothing is that important.
general.author: Natalie Goldberg

general.quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think. When the mind is pure, joy follows like a shadow that never leaves
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Our character is what we do when we think no one is looking.
general.author: Jackson Browne

general.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
general.author: Norman Vincent Peale

general.quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
general.author: Nelson Mandela

general.quote: The truth is, unless you let go, unless you forgive yourself, unless you forgive the situation, unless you realize that that situation is over, you cannot move forward.
general.author: Steve Maraboli

general.quote: How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Upon awakening, let the words Thank You flow from your lips, for this will remind you to begin your day with gratitude and compassion.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
general.author: Robert Byrne

general.quote: If you believe it will work out , you'll see opportunities. If you believe it won't you will see obstacles.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Don't waste your time with explanations: people only hear what they want to hear.
general.author: Paulo Coelho

general.quote: Don't take anything personally. Nothing other people do is because of you. It is because of themselves
general.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

general.quote: Have patience. Wait until the mud settles and the water is clear. Remain unmoving until right action arises by itself.
general.author: Lao Tzu

general.quote: Do not listen to those who weep and complain, for their disease is contagious.
general.author: Og Mandino

general.quote: Being happy doesn't mean that everything is perfect. It means you've decided to look beyond the imperfections.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: The poor man is not he who is without a cent, but he who is without a dream.
general.author: Harry Kemp

general.quote: The things we touch have no permanence. My master would say: there is nothing we can hold onto in this world. Only by letting go can we truly possess what is real.
general.author: Crouching Tiger, hidden Dragon

general.quote: If you worry about what might be, and wonder what might have been, you will ignore what is.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Nothing is permanent in this wicked world – not even our troubles.
general.author: Charlie Chaplin

general.quote: Presence is when you're no longer waiting for the next moment, believing that the next moment will be more fulfilling than this one.
general.author: Eckhart Tolle

general.quote: If you want to learn, teach. If you need inspiration, inspire others. If you're sad, cheer someone up.
general.author: Leo Babauta

general.quote: Walk away from anything or anyone who takes away from your joy. Life is too short to put up with fools.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: It is the power of the mind to be unconquerable.
general.author: Seneca

general.quote: Forget injuries, never forget kindnesses.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: He who will not economize will have to agonize.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Ignorance is the night of the mind, but a night without moon and star.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Men's natures are alike, it is their habits that carry them far apart.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in getting up every time we do.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Respect yourself and others will respect you.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Study the past if you would define the future.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: The superior man, when resting in safety, does not forget that danger may come. When in a state of security he does not forget the possibility of ruin. When all is orderly, he does not forget that disorder may come. Thus his person is not endangered, and his States and all their clans are preserved.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: To be able under all circumstances to practice five things constitutes perfect virtue; these five things are gravity, generosity of soul, sincerity, earnestness and kindness.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: To see what is right and not to do it is want of courage.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: What the superior man seeks is in himself; what the small man seeks is in others.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: When anger rises, think of the consequences.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: When we see men of a contrary character, we should turn inwards and examine ourselves.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Wheresoever you go, go with all your heart.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: They must often change who would be constant in happiness or wisdom.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: By nature, men are nearly alike; by practice, they get to be wide apart.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Fine words and an insinuating appearance are seldom associated with true virtue.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Have no friends not equal to yourself.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: He who exercises government by means of his virtue may be compared to the north polar star, which keeps its place and all the stars turn towards it.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: He who speaks without modesty will find it difficult to make his words good.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: He with whom neither slander that gradually soaks into the mind, nor statements that startle like a wound in the flesh, are successful may be called intelligent indeed.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Hold faithfulness and sincerity as first principles.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: I am not one who was born in the possession of knowledge; I am one who is fond of antiquity, and earnest in seeking it there.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: I have not seen a person who loved virtue, or one who hated what was not virtuous. He who loved virtue would esteem nothing above it.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Love is the absence of judgement.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote:
There is a saying in Tibetan, ‘Tragedy should be utilized as a source of strength.'
No matter what sort of difficulties, how painful experience is, if we lose our hope, that's our real disaster.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Remember that the best relationship is one in which your love for each other exceeds your need for each other.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Every day, think as you wake up, today I am fortunate to be alive, I have a precious human life, I am not going to waste it. I am going to use all my energies to develop myself, to expand my heart out to others; to achieve enlightenment for the benefit of all beings. I am going to have kind thoughts towards others, I am not going to get angry or think badly about others. I am going to benefit others as much as I can.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Silence is sometimes the best answer
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Know the rules well, so you can break them effectively.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Choose to be optimistic, it feels better.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them, humanity cannot survive.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: If a problem is fixable, if a situation is such that you can do something about it, then there is no need to worry. If it's not fixable, then there is no help in worrying. There is no benefit in worrying whatsoever.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: This is my simple religion. No need for temples. No need for complicated philosophy. Your own mind, your own heart is the temple. Your philosophy is simple kindness.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Judge your success by what you had to give up in order to get it.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: When we meet real tragedy in life, we can react in two ways–either by losing hope and falling into self-destructive habits, or by using the challenge to find our inner strength.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: People take different roads seeking fulfillment and happiness. Just because they're not on your road doesn't mean they've gotten lost.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: The whole purpose of religion is to facilitate love and compassion, patience, tolerance, humility, and forgiveness.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: If you can cultivate the right attitude, your enemies are your best spiritual teachers because their presence provides you with the opportunity to enhance and develop tolerance, patience and understanding.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: I believe compassion to be one of the few things we can practice that will bring immediate and long-term happiness to our lives. I'm not talking about the short-term gratification of pleasures like sex, drugs or gambling (though I'm not knocking them), but something that will bring true and lasting happiness. The kind that sticks.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Only the development of compassion and understanding for others can bring us the tranquility and happiness we all seek.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Take into account that great love and great achievements involve great risk.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: There is only one important point you must keep in your mind and let it be your guide. No matter what people call you, you are just who you are. Keep to this truth. You must ask yourself how is it you want to live your life. We live and we die, this is the truth that we can only face alone. No one can help us, not even the Buddha. So consider carefully, what prevents you from living the way you want to live your life?
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Look at children. Of course they may quarrel, but generally speaking they do not harbor ill feelings as much or as long as adults do. Most adults have the advantage of education over children, but what is the use of an education if they show a big smile while hiding negative feelings deep inside? Children don't usually act in such a manner. If they feel angry with someone, they express it, and then it is finished. They can still play with that person the following day.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: World peace must develop from inner peace. Peace is not just mere absence of violence. Peace is, I think, the manifestation of human compassion.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: All suffering is caused by ignorance. People inflict pain on others in the selfish pursuit of their own happiness or satisfaction.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: A truly compassionate attitude toward others does not change even if they behave negatively or hurt you.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote:
The more you are motivated by Love,
The more Fearless & Free your action will be.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: We can live without religion and meditation, but we cannot survive without human affection.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Old friends pass away, new friends appear. It is just like the days. An old day passes, a new day arrives. The important thing is to make it meaningful: a meaningful friend – or a meaningful day.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Hard times build determination and inner strength. Through them we can also come to appreciate the uselessness of anger. Instead of getting angry nurture a deep caring and respect for troublemakers because by creating such trying circumstances they provide us with invaluable opportunities to practice tolerance and patience.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: When you realize you've made a mistake, take immediate steps to correct it.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: A good friend who points out mistakes and imperfections and rebukes evil is to be respected as if he reveals the secret of some hidden treasure.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: The way to change others' minds is with affection, and not anger.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: If you have fear of some pain or suffering, you should examine whether there is anything you can do about it. If you can, there is no need to worry about it; if you cannot do anything, then there is also no need to worry.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Love and Compassion are the true religions to me. But to develop this, we do not need to believe in any religion.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Inner peace is the key: if you have inner peace, the external problems do not affect your deep sense of peace and tranquility…without this inner peace, no matter how comfortable your life is materially, you may still be worried, disturbed, or unhappy because of circumstances.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: The purpose of all the major religious traditions is not to construct big temples on the outside, but to create temples of goodness and compassion inside, in our hearts.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Compassion is the radicalism of our time.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Because we all share this planet earth, we have to learn to live in harmony and peace with each other and with nature. This is not just a dream, but a necessity.

general.quote: When we are motivated by compassion and wisdom, the results of our actions benefit everyone, not just our individual selves or some immediate convenience. general.quote: It is under the greatest adversity that there exists the greatest potential for doing good, both for oneself and others.

general.quote: Irrespective of whether we are believers or agnostics, whether we believe in God or karma, moral ethics is a code which everyone is able to pursue.

general.quote: Peace does not mean an absence of conflicts; differences will always be there. Peace means solving these differences through peaceful means; through dialogue, education, knowledge; and through humane ways.

general.quote: I defeat my enemies when I make them my friends.

general.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

general.quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.

general.quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.

general.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do.

general.quote: A friend is one that knows you as you are, understands where you have been, accepts what you have become, and still, gently allows you to grow.

general.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.

general.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.

general.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
general.author: Harriet Tubman

general.quote: What you do speaks so loudly that I cannot hear what you say.

general.quote: Spread love everywhere you go: first of all in your own house. Give love to your children, to your wife or husband, to a next door neighbor. general.author: Chinese Proverb

general.quote: I always find beauty in things that are odd and imperfect - they are much more interesting.

general.quote: I never said I wanted a 'happy' life but an interesting one. From separation and loss, I have learned a lot. We don't even know how strong we are until we are forced to bring that hidden strength forward.
general.author: Isabel Allende

general.quote: It's okay to lose. Losing teaches you something. Having to try and going through the trials and tribulations to actually overcome, to get there to win, to triumph, that's what makes life interesting.
general.author: Elizabeth Banks

general.quote: A figure with curves always offers a lot of interesting angles.
general.author: Wesley Ruggles

general.quote: Art is interesting because there can be so many different perspectives in a piece of art. The way I see it may be completely different than the way somebody else sees it. It's interesting to hear what somebody sees in a piece of art compared to somebody else. It could be completely different, and that's interesting to me.
general.author: Joakim Noah

general.quote: I don't say I create. I copy, of course. I've never been interested in the point of view of the tailor or creator. Fashion is a visual impression. This is why I often refuse the name of fashion designer. It's a superficial, stupid job. The social-psychological aspect is more interesting.
general.author: Franco Moschino

general.quote: My interesting diet tips are eat early and don't nosh between meals. I mean, I can pack it away.
general.author: Carol Burnett

general.quote: I love you the more in that I believe you had liked me for my own sake and for nothing else.
general.author: John Keats

general.quote: But man is not made for defeat. A man can be destroyed but not defeated.
general.author: Ernest Hemingway
